analyzed: kim saṅghassa pubba kiccam pārisuddhim āyasmantaḥ ārocetha pātimokkham uddisissāmi

original: Adinnādānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: adinnādāna sikkhāpadam

analyzed: kuṭikāra sikkhāpadam

original: Duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadaṃ

analyzed: vā a samanuggāhīyamānaḥ vā amūlakam ca iva tat adhikaraṇam hoti bhikkhu ca dosam patiṭṭhāti saṅgha ādisesaḥ

original: Aññabhāgiyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aññabhāgiya sikkhāpadaṃ

original: Bhedānuvattakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bheda anuvattaka sikkhāpadam

analyzed: kaccit ttha parisuddhā dutiyam pi pucchāmi kaccit ttha parisuddhā tatiyam pi pucchāmi

original: kaccittha parisuddhā, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmīti.
analyzed: kaccit tha parisuddhā parisuddhā itthā ayasmantaḥ tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Nissaggiyapācittiyā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nissaggiya pācittiyā niṭṭhitā

original: Suddhapācittiyā
analyzed: suddha pācittiyā

original: Ime kho panāyasmanto dvenavuti pācittiyā
analyzed: ime kho pana āyasmantaḥ dvenavuti pācittiyāḥ

original: Dhammā uddesaṃ āgacchanti.
analyzed: dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Musāvādasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: musāvāda sikkhāpadam

original: 1. Sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: sampajāna musāvāde pācittiyam

original: Omasavādasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: omasavāda sikkhāpadam

original: 2. Omasavāde pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: omasavāde pācittiyam

original: Pesuññasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pesuñña sikkhāpadam

original: 3. Bhikkhupesuññe pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhu pesuññe pācittiyam

original: Padasodhammasikkhāpadaṃ
4. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vāceyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannam padasaḥ dhammam vāceyya pācittiyam

original: Paṭhamasahaseyyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama sahaseyya sikkhāpadam

original: 5. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannena uttari diratta tirattam sahaseyyam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Dutiyasahaseyyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya sahaseyya sikkhāpadam

original: 6. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmena sahaseyyam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Dhammadesanāsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dhamma desanā sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 7. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ deseyya aññatra viññunā purisaviggahena, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmassa uttari chappañca vācāhi dhammam deseyya aññatra viññunā purisa viggahena pācittiyam

original: Bhūtārocanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bhūtārocana sikkhāpadam

original: 8. Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ āroceyya, bhūtasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu an upasampannassa uttari manussa dhammaṃ āroceyya bhūtasmim pācittiyam

original: Duṭṭhullārocanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: duṭṭhullārocana sikkhāpadam

original: 9. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa duṭṭhullam āpattim an upasampannassa āroceyya aññatra bhikkhu sammutiyā pācittiyam

original: Pathavīkhaṇanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pathavīkhaṇana sikkhāpadam

original: 10. Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu pathavim khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Musāvādavaggo paṭhamo.
analyzed: musāvāda vaggaḥ paṭhamaḥ

original: Bhūtagāmasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bhūtagāma sikkhāpadam

original: 11. Bhūtagāmapātabyatāya pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhūta gāma pātabya tāya pācittiyam

original: Aññavādakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aññavādaka sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 12. Aññavādake, vihesake pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: aññavādake vihesake pācittiyam

original: Ujjhāpanakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ujjhāpanaka sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 13. Ujjhāpanake, khiyyanake pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: ujjhāpanake khiyyanake pācittiyam

original: Paṭhamasenāsanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama senāsana sikkhāpadam

original: 14. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghikam mañcam vā pīṭham vā bhisim vā koccham vā ajjhokāse

original: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya,
analyzed: santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā tam pakkamantaḥ na iva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya

original: anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: an āpuccham vā gaccheyya pācittiyam

original: Dutiyasenāsanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya senāsana sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 15. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā taṃ pakkamanto neva uddhareyya, na uddharāpeyya, anāpucchaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre seyyam santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā tam pakkamantaḥ na iva uddhareyya na uddharāpeyya anāpuccham vā gaccheyya pācittiyam

original: Anupakhajjasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: an upakhajja sikkhāpadam

original: 16. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre jānam pubbupagatam bhikkhum an upakhajja seyyam

original: kappeyya “yassa sambādho bhavissati, so pakkamissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
analyzed: kappeyya yassa sambādhaḥ bhavissati saḥ pakkamissati iti etat eva paccayam karitvā

original: anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: anaññam pācittiyam

original: Nikkaḍḍhanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nikkaḍḍhana sikkhāpadam

original: 17. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ kupito anattamano saṅghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum kupitaḥ an atta manaḥ saṅghikāḥ vihārāḥ nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Vehāsakuṭisikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: vehāsa kuṭi sikkhāpadam

original: 18. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghike vihāre upari vehāsa kuṭiyā āhacca pādakam mañcam vā pīṭham vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Mahallakavihārasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: mahallakavihāra sikkhāpadam

original: 19. Mahallakaṃ pana bhikkhunā vihāraṃ kārayamānena yāva dvārakosā aggaḷaṭṭhapanāya
analyzed: mahallakam pana bhikkhunā vihāram kārayamānena yāva dvāra kosāḥ aggaḷa ṭṭhapanāya

original: ālokasandhiparikammāya dvatticchadanassa pariyāyaṃ appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbaṃ,
analyzed: āloka sandhi parikammāya dvatti chadanassa pariyāyam appaharite ṭhitena adhiṭṭhātabbam

original: tato ce uttari appaharitepi ṭhito adhiṭṭhaheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: tato ce uttari appaharite pi ṭhitaḥ adhiṭṭhaheyya pācittiyam

original: Sappāṇakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sappāṇaka sikkhāpadam

original: 20. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam sappāṇakam udakam tiṇam vā mattikam vā siñceyya vā siñcāpeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Bhūtagāmavaggo dutiyo.
analyzed: bhūtagāma vaggaḥ dutiyaḥ

original: Ovādasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ovāda sikkhāpadam

original: 21. Yo pana bhikkhu asammato bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu asammataḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadeyya pācittiyam

original: Atthaṅgatasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: atthaṅgata sikkhāpadam

original: 22. Sammatopi ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: sammataḥ api ce bhikkhu atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadeyya pācittiyam

original: Bhikkhunupassayasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhun upassaya sikkhāpadam

original: 23. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānā hoti bhikkhunī, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuni passayam upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam samayaḥ gilānā hoti bhikkhunī ayam tattha samayaḥ

original: Āmisasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: āmisa sikkhāpadam

original: 24. Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “āmisahetu therā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu evam vadeyya āmisa hetu therāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhuniyaḥ ovadanti iti pācittiyam

original: Cīvaradānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: cīvara dāna sikkhāpadam

original: 25. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dadeyya aññatra pārivattakā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaram dadeyya aññatra pārivattakā pācittiyam

original: Cīvarasibbanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: cīvara sibbana sikkhāpadam

original: 26. Yo pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaram sibbeyya vā sibbāpeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Saṃvidhānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: saṃvidhāna sikkhāpadam

original: 27. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjeyya antamasaḥ

original: gāmantarampi aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, satthagamanīyo hoti maggo,
analyzed: gām antaram pi aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam samayaḥ sattha gamanīyaḥ hoti maggo

original: sāsaṅkasammato, sappaṭibhayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: sa āsaṅka sammataḥ sa paṭibhayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ

original: Nāvābhiruhanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nāvā abhiruhana sikkhāpadam

original: 28. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruheyya uddhaṃgāminiṃ vā adhogāminiṃ vā aññatra tiriyaṃ taraṇāya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim saṃvidhāya ekam nāvam abhiruheyya uddhaṃgāminim vā adhogāminim vā aññatra tiriyam taraṇāya pācittiyam

original: Paripācitasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paripācita sikkhāpadam

original: 29. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihisamārambhā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam bhikkhuni paripācitam piṇḍapātam bhuñjeyya aññatra pubbe gihi samārambhā pācittiyam

original: Rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: rahonisajja sikkhāpadam

original: 30. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Ovādavaggo tatiyo.
analyzed: ovāda vaggo tatiyo

original: Āvasathapiṇḍasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: āvasatha piṇḍa sikkhāpadam

original: 31. Agilānena bhikkhunā eko āvasathapiṇḍo bhuñjitabbo. Tato ce uttari bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: a gilānena bhikkhunā ekaḥ āvasatha piṇḍaḥ bhuñjitabbo tatas ce uttari bhuñjeyya pācittiyam

original: Gaṇabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: gaṇa bhojana sikkhāpadam

original: 32. Gaṇabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo,
analyzed: gaṇa bhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam samayaḥ gilāna samayaḥ cīvara dāna samayaḥ

original: cīvarakārasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, nāvābhiruhanasamayo, mahāsamayo, samaṇabhattasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: cīvarakāra samayaḥ addhāna gamana samayaḥ nāvā abhiruhana samayaḥ mahā samayaḥ samaṇa bhatta samayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ

original: Paramparabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: parampara bhojana sikkhāpadam

original: 33. Paramparabhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ samayo, gilānasamayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: parampara bhojane aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam samayaḥ gilāna samayaḥ cīvara dāna samayaḥ cīvarakāra samayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ

original: Kāṇamātusikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: kāṇamātusikkhāpadam

original: 34. Bhikkhuṃ paneva kulaṃ upagataṃ pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya, ākaṅkhamānena
analyzed: bhikkhum pana iva kulam upagatam pūvehi vā manthehi vā abhihaṭṭhum pavāreyya ākaṅkhamānena

original: bhikkhunā dvattipattapūrā paṭiggahetabbā. Tato ce uttari paṭiggaṇheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhikkhunā dvatti patta pūrā paṭiggahetabbā tatas ce uttari paṭiggaṇheyya pācittiyam

original: Dvattipattapūre paṭiggahetvā tato nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
analyzed: dvatti patta pūre paṭiggahetvā tatas nīharitvā bhikkhūhi saddhim saṃvibhajitabbam ayam tattha sāmīci

original: Paṭhamapavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama pavāraṇā sikkhāpadam

original: 35. Yo pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavārito anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhuttāvī pavāritaḥ anatirittam khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Dutiyapavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya pavāraṇā sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 36. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum bhuttāvim pavāritam anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena

original: vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāreyya “handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho,
analyzed: vā abhihaṭṭhum pavāreyya handa bhikkhu khāda vā bhuñja vā ati jānam āsādana apekkhaḥ

original: bhuttasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: bhuttasmim pācittiyam

original: Vikālabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: vikālabhojana sikkhāpadam

original: 37. Yo pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu vikāle khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Sannidhikārakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sannidhi kāraka sikkhāpadam

original: 38. Yo pana bhikkhu sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sannidhi kārakam khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Paṇītabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṇīta bhojana sikkhāpadam

original: 39. Yāni kho pana tāni paṇītabhojanāni, seyyathidaṃ – sappi, navanītaṃ, telaṃ, madhu,
analyzed: yāni khalu pana tāni paṇīta bhojanāni seyyathā idam sappi navanītam telam madhu

original: phāṇitaṃ, maccho, maṃsaṃ, khīraṃ, dadhi. Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni
analyzed: phāṇitam macchaḥ maṃsam khīram dadhi yaḥ pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇīta bhojanāni

original: agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: a gilānaḥ attanaḥ atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya pācittiyam

original: Dantaponasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dantapona sikkhāpadam

original: 40. Yo pana bhikkhu adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āhareyya aññatra udakadantaponā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu adinnam mukha dvāram āhāram āhareyya aññatra udaka danta ponā pācittiyam

original: Bhojanavaggo catuttho.
analyzed: bhojana vaggo catutthaḥ

original: Acelakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: acelaka sikkhāpadam

original: 41. Yo pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadeyya pācittiyam

original: Uyyojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: uyyojana sikkhāpadam

original: 42. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum ehi āvuso gāmam vā nigamam vā piṇḍāya pavisissāma ati

original: tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojeyya “gacchāvuso, na me tayā saddhiṃ kathā vā nisajjā
analyzed: tassa dāpetvā vā a dāpetvā vā uyyojeyya gaccha āvuso na me tayā saddhim kathā vā nisajjā

original: vā phāsu hoti, ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hotī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā
analyzed: vā phāsu hoti ekakassa me kathā vā nisajjā vā phāsu hoti iti etat eva paccayam karitvā

original: anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: anaññam pācittiyam

original: Sabhojanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sa bhojana sikkhāpadam

original: 43. Yo pana bhikkhu sabhojane kule anupakhajja nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sa bhojane kule an upakhajja nisajjam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Rahopaṭicchannasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: raha upaṭicchanna sikkhāpadam

original: 44. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhim raho paṭicchanne āsane nisajjam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Rahonisajjasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: rahonisajja sikkhāpadam

original: 45. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhim ekaḥ ekāya rahaḥ nisajjam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Cārittasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: cāritta sikkhāpadam

original: 46. Yo pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhatto samāno santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā purebhattaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu nimantito sabhattaḥ samāno santam bhikkhum anāpucchā purebhattam

original: vā pacchābhattaṃ vā kulesu cārittaṃ āpajjeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
analyzed: vā pacchābhattam vā kulesu cārittam āpajjeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam

original: samayo, cīvaradānasamayo, cīvarakārasamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: samayo cīvara dāna samayo cīvara kāra samayo ayam tattha samayo

original: Mahānāmasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: mahānāma sikkhāpadam

original: 47. Agilānena bhikkhunā catumāsappaccayapavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya, aññatra niccapavāraṇāya. Tato ce uttari sādiyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: a gilānena bhikkhunā catu māsa paccaya pavāraṇā sāditabbā aññatra punapavāraṇāya aññatra nicca pavāraṇāya tatas ce uttari sādiyeyya pācittiyam

original: Uyyuttasenāsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: uyyutta senā sikkhāpadam

original: 48. Yo pana bhikkhu uyyuttaṃ senaṃ dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu uyyuttam senam dassanāya gaccheyya aññatra tathārūpa ppaccayā pācittiyam

original: Senāvāsasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: senāvāsa sikkhāpadam

original: 49. Siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocideva paccayo senaṃ gamanāya, dirattatirattaṃ tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbaṃ. Tato ce uttari vaseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: siyā ca tassa bhikkhuno kocid eva paccayaḥ senam gamanāya diratta tirattam tena bhikkhunā senāya vasitabbam tatas ce uttari vaseyya pācittiyam

original: Uyyodhikasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: uyyodhika sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 50. Dirattatirattaṃ ce bhikkhu senāya vasamāno uyyodhikaṃ vā balaggaṃ vā senābyūhaṃ vā anīkadassanaṃ vā gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: dirattatirattam ce bhikkhu senāya vasamānaḥ uyyodhikam vā balaggam vā senā byūham vā anīkadassanam vā gaccheyya pācittiyam

original: Acelakavaggo pañcamo.
analyzed: acelaka vaggaḥ pañcamaḥ

original: Surāpānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: surā pāna sikkhāpadam

original: 51. Surāmerayapāne pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: surā meraya pāne pācittiyam

original: Aṅgulipatodakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: aṅguli patodaka sikkhāpadam

original: 52. Aṅgulipatodake pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: aṅguli patodake pācittiyam

original: Hasadhammasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: hasa dhamma sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 53. Udake hasadhamme pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: udake ha sa dhamme pācittiyam

original: Anādariyasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: anādariya sikkhāpadam

original: 54. Anādariye pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: an ādariye pācittiyam

original: Bhiṃsāpanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bhiṃsāpana sikkhāpadam

original: 55. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhiṃsāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum bhiṃsā peyya pācittiyam

original: Jotisikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: joti sikkhāpadam

original: 56. Yo pana bhikkhu agilāno visibbanāpekkho jotiṃ samādaheyya vā samādahāpeyya vā aññatra tathārūpappaccayā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu agilānaḥ visibbana apekkho jotim samādaheyya vā vā aññatra tathārūpa paccayā pācittiyam

original: Nahānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nahāna sikkhāpadam

original: 57. Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṃ nahāyeyya aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṃ. Tatthāyaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiyam tattha ayam

original: samayo “diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhāna”nti “vassānassa paṭhamo māso” iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā
analyzed: samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māsaḥ icc ete aḍḍhateyya māsā

original: uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo, ayaṃ tattha samayo.
analyzed: uṇha samayo pariḷāha samayo gilāna samayo kamma samayo addhāna gamana samayo vāta vuṭṭhi samayo ayam tattha samayo

original: Dubbaṇṇakaraṇasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dubbaṇṇa karaṇa sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 58. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā cīvaralābhena tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ
analyzed: navam pana bhikkhunā cīvara lābhena tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānaṃ aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam

original: ādātabbaṃ nīlaṃ vā kaddamaṃ vā kāḷasāmaṃ vā. Anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇaṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇānaṃ
analyzed: ādātabbam nīlam vā kaddamam vā kāḷasāmam vā anādā ce bhikkhu tiṇṇam dubbaṇṇa karaṇānam

original: aññataraṃ dubbaṇṇakaraṇaṃ navaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: aññataram dubbaṇṇa karaṇam navam cīvaram paribhuñjeyya pācittiyam

original: Vikappanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: vikappana sikkhāpadam

original: 59. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa vā bhikkhuniyā vā sikkhamānāya vā sāmaṇerassa vā sāmaṇeriyā vā sāmam cīvaram vikappetvā appaccuddhāraṇam paribhuñjeyya pācittiyam

original: Apanidhānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: apanidhāna sikkhāpadam

original: 60. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā nisīdanaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ vā kāyabandhanaṃ vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamaso hasāpekkhopi, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa pattam vā cīvaram vā nisīdanam vā sūci gharam vā kāya bandhanam vā apanidheyya vā apanidhāpeyya vā antamasaḥ hasa apekkhaḥ api pācittiyam

original: Surāpānavaggo chaṭṭho.
analyzed: surā pāna vaggaḥ chaṭṭhaḥ

original: Sañciccasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sañcicca sikkhāpadam

original: 61. Yo pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇam jīvitā voropeyya pācittiyam

original: Sappāṇakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sappāṇaka sikkhāpadam

original: 62. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ paribhuñjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam sappāṇakam udakam paribhuñjeyya pācittiyam

original: Ukkoṭanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ukkoṭana sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 63. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ yathādhammaṃ nihatādhikaraṇaṃ punakammāya ukkoṭeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam yathādhammam nihata adhikaraṇam punakammāya ukkoṭeyya pācittiyam

original: Duṭṭhullasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: duṭṭhulla sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 64. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānaṃ duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ paṭicchādeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa jānam duṭṭhullam āpattim paṭicchādeyya pācittiyam

original: Ūnavīsativassasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ūnavīsati vassa sikkhāpadam

original: 65. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ ūnavīsativassaṃ puggalaṃ upasampādeyya, so ca puggalo anupasampanno, te ca bhikkhū gārayhā, idaṃ tasmiṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam ūnavīsati vassam puggalam upasampādeyya saḥ ca puggalaḥ an upasampannaḥ te ca bhikkhū gārayhāḥ idam tasmim pācittiyam

original: Theyyasatthasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: theyyasattha sikkhāpadam

original: 66. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam theyyasatthena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjeyya antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi pācittiyam

original: Saṃvidhānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: saṃvidhāna sikkhāpadam

original: 67. Yo pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjeyya antamaso gāmantarampi, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mātugāmena saddhim saṃvidhāya ekaddhāna maggam paṭipajjeyya antamasaḥ gāmantaram pi pācittiyam

original: Ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ariṭṭha sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 68. Yo pana bhikkhu evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu evam vadeyya tathā aham bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāmi yathā

original: yeme antarāyikā dhammā vuttā bhagavatā, te paṭisevato nālaṃ antarāyāyā”ti, so bhikkhu
analyzed: ye me antarāyikāḥ dhammāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā te paṭisevataḥ na alam antarāyāya ati so bhikkhu

original: bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māyasmā evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi, na hi
analyzed: bhikkhūhi evam assa vacanīyaḥ mā ayasmai evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi na hi

original: sādhu bhagavato abbhakkhānaṃ, na hi bhagavā evaṃ vadeyya, anekapariyāyenāvuso antarāyikā
analyzed: sādhu bhagavataḥ abbhakkhānam na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya aneka pariyāyena āvuso antarāyikā

original: dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato antarāyāyā”ti. Evañca
analyzed: dhammā antarāyikāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā alam ca pana te paṭisevataḥ antarāyāya ati evam ca

analyzed: so bhikkhu bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ tathā iva paggaṇheyya saḥ bhikkhu bhikkhūhi yāvatatiyam

original: samanubhāsitabbo tassa paṭinissaggāya. Yāvatatiyañce samanubhāsiyamāno taṃ paṭinissajjeyya,
analyzed: samanubhāsitabbaḥ tassa paṭinissaggāya yāvatatiyam ce samanubhāsiyamānaḥ tam paṭinissajjeyya

original: iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce paṭinissajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: icca etam kusalam no ce paṭinissajjeyya pācittiyam

original: Ukkhittasambhogasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ukkhitta sambhoga sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 69. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ tathāvādinā bhikkhunā akaṭānudhammena taṃ diṭṭhiṃ appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhiṃ sambhuñjeyya vā, saṃvaseyya vā, saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam tathāvādinā bhikkhunā a kaṭa anudhammena tam diṭṭhim appaṭinissaṭṭhena saddhim sambhuñjeyya vā saṃvaseyya vā saha vā seyyam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Kaṇṭakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: kaṇṭaka sikkhāpadam

original: 70. Samaṇuddesopi ce evaṃ vadeyya “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā
analyzed: samaṇuddesaḥ api ce evam vadeyya tathā aham bhagavatā dhammam desitam ājānāmi yathā

analyzed: ye me antarāyikāḥ dhammāḥ vuttāḥ bhagavatā te paṭisevataḥ na alam antarāyāya ati saḥ samaṇuddeso

original: bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “māvuso, samaṇuddesa evaṃ avaca, mā bhagavantaṃ abbhācikkhi,
analyzed: bhikkhūhi evam assa vacanīyaḥ mā āvuso samaṇuddesa evam avaca mā bhagavantam abbhācikkhi

analyzed: na hi sādhu bhagavataḥ abbhakkhānam na hi bhagavā evam vadeyya aneka pariyāyena āvuso

original: samaṇuddesa antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttā bhagavatā, alañca pana te paṭisevato
analyzed: samaṇuddesa antarāyikā dhammā antarāyikā vuttāḥ bhagavatā alam ca pana te paṭisevato

original: antarāyāyā”ti, evañca so samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi vuccamāno tatheva paggaṇheyya, so
analyzed: antarāyāya ati evañca saḥ samaṇuddesaḥ bhikkhūhi vuccamānaḥ tathā iva paggaṇheyya so

original: samaṇuddeso bhikkhūhi evamassa vacanīyo “ajjatagge te, āvuso, samaṇuddesa na ceva
analyzed: samaṇuddesaḥ bhikkhūhi evam assa vacanīyaḥ ajjatagge te āvuso samaṇuddesa na ca iva

original: so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo, yampi caññe samaṇuddesā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ
analyzed: so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbaḥ yam pi caññe samaṇuddesāḥ labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhim

original: dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ, sāpi te natthi, cara pire, vinassā”ti. Yo pana bhikkhu
analyzed: sahaseyyam sā api te natthi cara pire vinassāti yaḥ pana bhikkhu

original: jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpeyya vā, upaṭṭhāpeyya vā, sambhuñjeyya vā,
analyzed: jānam tathā anāsitam samaṇa uddesam upalāpeyya vā upaṭṭhāpeyya vā sambhuñjeyya vā

original: saha vā seyyaṃ kappeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: saha vā seyyam kappeyya pācittiyam

original: Sappāṇakavaggo sattamo.
analyzed: sappāṇaka vaggaḥ sattamaḥ

original: Sahadhammikasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sahadhammika sikkhāpadam

original: 71. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno evaṃ vadeyya “na tāvāhaṃ, āvuso,
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhūhi sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ evam vadeyya na tāva aham āvuso

original: etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi, yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī”ti,
analyzed: etasmim sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññam bhikkhum byattam vinaya dharam paripucchāmi iti

original: pācittiyaṃ. Sikkhamānena, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā aññātabbaṃ paripucchitabbaṃ paripañhitabbaṃ, ayaṃ tattha sāmīci.
analyzed: pācittiyam sikkhamānena bhikkhave bhikkhunā aññātabbam paripucchitabbam paripañhitabbam ayam tattha sāmīci

original: Vilekhanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: vilekhana sikkhāpadam

original: 72. Yo pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “kiṃ panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu pātimokkhe uddissamāne evam vadeyya kim panimehi khuddānukhuddakehi

original: sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi, yāvadeva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattantī”ti, sikkhāpadavivaṇṇake pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: sikkhāpadehi uddiṭṭhehi yāvat eva kukkuccāya vihesāya vilekhāya saṃvattanti iti sikkhāpada vivaṇṇake pācittiyam

original: Mohanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: mohana sikkhāpadam

original: 73. Yo pana bhikkhu anvaddhamāsaṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne evaṃ vadeyya “idāneva kho
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu anvaddha māsam pātimokkhe uddissamāne evam vadeyya idānā iva kho

original: ahaṃ jānāmi, ayampi kira dhammo suttāgato suttapariyāpanno anvaddhamāsaṃ uddesaṃ
analyzed: aham jānāmi ayam pi kira dhammo sutta āgataḥ sutta pariyāpannaḥ anvaddha māsam uddesam

original: āgacchatī”ti. Tañce bhikkhuṃ aññe bhikkhū jāneyyuṃ nisinnapubbaṃ iminā bhikkhunā
analyzed: āgacchati iti tat ce bhikkhum aññe bhikkhū jāneyyum nisinna pubbam iminā bhikkhunā

original: dvattikkhattuṃ pātimokkhe uddissamāne, ko pana vādo bhiyyo, na ca tassa bhikkhuno
analyzed: dvatti khattum pātimokkhe uddissamāne kaḥ pana vādaḥ bhiyyaḥ na ca tassa bhikkhuno

original: aññāṇakena mutti atthi, yañca tattha āpattiṃ āpanno, tañca yathādhammo kāretabbo,
analyzed: aññāṇakena mutti atthi yat ca tattha āpattim āpanno tat ca yathādhammaḥ kāretabbo

original: uttari cassa moho āropetabbo “tassa te, āvuso, alābhā, tassa te dulladdhaṃ, yaṃ tvaṃ
analyzed: uttari ca assa mohaḥ āropetabbo tassa te āvuso alābhā tassa te dulladdham yam tvam

original: pātimokkhe uddissamānena sādhukaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi karosī”ti, idaṃ tasmiṃ mohanake pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: pātimokkhe uddissamānena sādhukam aṭṭhim katvā manasi karosi iti idam tasmim mohanake pācittiyam

original: Pahārasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pahāra sikkhāpadam

original: 74. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano pahāraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ pahāram dadeyya pācittiyam

original: Talasattikasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: talasattika sikkhāpadam

original: 75. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṃ uggireyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupitaḥ anatta manaḥ tala sattikam uggireyya pācittiyam

original: Amūlakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: a mūlaka sikkhāpadam

original: 76. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṃseyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena an uddhaṃseyya pācittiyam

original: Sañciccasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sañcicca sikkhāpadam

original: 77. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccaṃ upadaheyya “itissa muhuttampi aphāsu bhavissatī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa sañcicca kukkuccam upadaheyya itissa muhuttam pi aphāsu bhavissati iti etat eva paccayam karitvā anaññam pācittiyam

original: Upassutisikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: upassuti sikkhāpadam

original: 78. Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ upassutiṃ tiṭṭheyya “yaṃ ime bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti etadeva paccayaṃ karitvā anaññaṃ, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnam bhaṇḍana jātānam kalaha jātānam vivāda āpannānam upassutim tiṭṭheyya yam ime bhaṇissanti tam sossāmi iti etat eva paccayam karitvā anaññam pācittiyam

original: Kammappaṭibāhanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: kammappaṭibāhana sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 79. Yo pana bhikkhu dhammikānaṃ kammānaṃ chandaṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu dhammikānam kammānam chandam datvā pacchā khīyana dhammam āpajjeyya pācittiyam

original: Chandaṃadatvāgamanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: chandaṃada tva āgamana sikkhāpadam

original: 80. Yo pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchayakathāya vattamānāya chandaṃ adatvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkameyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu saṅghe vinicchaya kathāya vattamānāya chandam a datvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkameyya pācittiyam

original: Dubbalasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dubbala sikkhāpadam

original: 81. Yo pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjeyya “yathāsanthutaṃ bhikkhū saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇāmentī”ti, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu samaggena saṅghena cīvaram datvā pacchā khīyana dhammam āpajjeyya yathāsanthutam bhikkhū saṅghikam lābham pariṇāmenti iti pācittiyam

original: Pariṇāmanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pariṇāmana sikkhāpadam

original: 82. Yo pana bhikkhu jānaṃ saṅghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu jānam saṅghikam lābham pariṇatam puggalassa pariṇāmeyya pācittiyam

original: Sahadhammikavaggo aṭṭhamo.
analyzed: sahadhammika vaggaḥ aṭṭhamaḥ

original: Antepurasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: antepura sikkhāpadam

original: 83. Yo pana bhikkhu rañño khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa anikkhantarājake aniggataratanake pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito indakhīlaṃ atikkāmeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu raññaḥ khattiyassa muddhābhisittassa a nikkhanta rājake a niggata ratanake pubbe a paṭisaṃviditaḥ inda khīlam atikkāmeyya pācittiyam

original: Ratanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ratana sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu ratanam vā ratana sammatam vā aññatra ajjhārāmā vā ajjhāvasathā

original: vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ. Ratanaṃ vā pana bhikkhunā ratanasammataṃ
analyzed: vā uggaṇheyya vā uggaṇhāpeyya vā pācittiyam ratanam vā pana bhikkhunā ratana sammatam

original: vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbaṃ “yassa
analyzed: vā ajjhārāme vā ajjhāvasathe vā uggahetvā vā uggahāpetvā vā nikkhipitabbam yassa

analyzed: bhavissati so harissati iti ayam tattha sāmīci

analyzed: vikālagāma pavesana sikkhāpadaṃ

original: 85. Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchāvikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu santam bhikkhum an āpucchā vikāle gāmam paviseyya aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā pācittiyam

original: Sūcigharasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sūcighara sikkhāpadam

original: 86. Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya, bhedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu aṭṭhi mayam vā danta mayam vā visāṇa mayam vā sūci gharam kārāpeyya bhedanakam pācittiyam

original: Mañcapīṭhasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: mañcapīṭha sikkhāpadam

original: 87. Navaṃ pana bhikkhunā mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārayamānena aṭṭhaṅgulapādakaṃ kāretabbaṃ sugataṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā. Taṃ atikkāmayato chedanakaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: navam pana bhikkhunā mañcam vā pīṭham vā kārayamānena aṭṭha aṅgula pādakam kāretabbam sugata ṅgulena aññatra heṭṭhimāya aṭaniyā tam atikkāmayataḥ chedanakam pācittiyam

analyzed: tūla ūnaddha sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu mañcam vā pīṭham vā tūla unaddham kārāpeyya uddālanakam pācittiyam

original: Nisīdanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nisīdana sikkhāpadam

analyzed: kaṇḍu paṭicchādi sikkhāpadam

analyzed: nanda sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu sugata cīvara ppamāṇam cīvaram kārāpeyya atirekam vā chedanakam

original: 17. Yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyaṃ santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī vikāle kulāni upasaṅkamitvā sāmike anāpucchā seyyam santharitvā vā santharāpetvā vā abhinisīdeyya vā abhinipajjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Paraujjhāpanakasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: para ojjhāpanaka sikkhāpadam

original: 18. Yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena paraṃ ujjhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī duggahitena dūpadhāritena param ujjhāpeyya pācittiyam

original: Paraabhisapanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: para abhisapana sikkhāpadam

original: 19. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vā paraṃ vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī attānam vā param vā nirayena vā brahmacariyena vā abhisapeyya pācittiyam

original: Rodanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: rodana sikkhāpadam

original: 20. Yā pana bhikkhunī attānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī attānam vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyya pācittiyam

original: Rattandhakāravaggo dutiyo.
analyzed: ratta ndhakāra vaggaḥ dutiyaḥ

original: Naggasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: nagga sikkhāpadam

original: 21. Yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī naggā nahāyeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: udaka sāṭikam pana bhikkhuniyā kārayamānāya pamāṇikā kāretabbā tatra idam pamāṇam

analyzed: catasso vidatthiyaḥ sugata vidatthiyā tiriyam dve vidatthiyaḥ tam atikkāmentiyā

original: Cīvarasibbanasikkhāpadaṃ

original: 23. Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva sibbeyya, na sibbāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya aññatra catūhapañcāhā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā cīvaram visibbetvā vā visibbāpetvā vā sā pacchā anantarāyikinī na iva sibbeyya na sibbāpanāya ussukkam kareyya aññatra catūha pañcāhā pācittiyam

analyzed: saṅghāṭicāra sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī pañcāhikam saṅghāṭi cāram atikkāmeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī cīvara saṅkamanīyam dhāreyya pācittiyam

analyzed: gaṇa cīvara sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī gaṇassa cīvara lābham antarāyam kareyya pācittiyam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikam cīvara vibhaṅgam paṭibāheyya pācittiyam

original: 28. Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇacīvaraṃ dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā samaṇa cīvaram dadeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: kāla atikkamana sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dubbala cīvara paccāsāya cīvara kāla samayam atikkāmeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: kathinuddhāra sikkhāpadam

original: Naggavaggo tatiyo.

analyzed: yāḥ pana bhikkhuniyaḥ dve ekattharaṇa pāvuraṇā pācittiyam

original: Aphāsukaraṇasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: a phāsukaraṇa sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā sañcicca a phāsum kareyya pācittiyam

analyzed: nikkaḍḍhana sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyāḥ upassayam da tvā kupitā anattamanāḥ nikkaḍḍheyya vā nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā pācittiyam

analyzed: saṃsaṭṭha sikkhāpadam

analyzed: bhikkhunīhi evam assa vacanīyā māyye saṃsaṭṭhā gahapatinā api gahapati puttena api

analyzed: vivicca āyye vivekaññā iva bhaginiyā saṅghaḥ vaṇṇeti iti evam ca sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi

analyzed: vuccamānā tathā iva paggaṇheyya sā bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi yāvatatiyam samanubhāsitabbā

analyzed: antoraṭṭha sikkhāpadam

analyzed: tiroraṭṭha sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī tiroraṭṭhe sa āsaṅka sammate sa paṭibhaye asatthikā cārikam careyya pācittiyam

original: Antovassasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: antovassa sikkhāpadam

original: Adhikaraṇasikkhāpadaṃ

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyāḥ ehāyye imam adhikaraṇam vūpasamehi iti vuccamānā

original: Bhojanadānasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: bhojana dāna sikkhāpadam

original: 46. Yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dadeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī agārikassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā dadeyya pācittiyam

original: Gaṇaparibhāsanasikkhāpadaṃ

original: Pavāritasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: pavārita sikkhāpadam

original: 54. Yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī nimantitā vā pavāritā vā khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Kulamaccharinīsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: kulamaccharinī sikkhāpadam

original: 55. Yā pana bhikkhunī kulamaccharinī assa, pācittiyaṃ.

analyzed: abhikkhuka āvāsa sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī abhikkhuke āvāse vassam vaseyya pācittiyam

original: Apavāraṇāsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: apavāraṇā sikkhāpadam

original: 57. Yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī vassaṃvuṭṭhā ubhatosaṅghe tīhi ṭhānehi na pavāreyya diṭṭhena vā sutena vā parisaṅkāya vā pācittiyam

original: Ovādasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ovāda sikkhāpadam

original: 58. Yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ovādāya vā saṃvāsāya vā na gaccheyya pācittiyam

original: Ovādūpasaṅkamanasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: ovāda upasaṅkamana sikkhāpadam

original: 59. Anvaddhamāsaṃ bhikkhuniyā bhikkhusaṅghato dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposathapucchakañca ovādūpasaṅkamanañca. Taṃ atikkāmentiyā pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: anvaddha māsam bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu saṅghataḥ dve dhammā paccāsīsitabbā uposatha pucchakañca ovāda upasaṅkamanañca tam atikkāmentiyā pācittiyam

original: Pasākhejātasikkhāpadaṃ
60. Yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātaṃ gaṇḍaṃ vā rudhitaṃ vā anapaloketvā saṅghaṃ vā
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī pasākhe jātam gaṇḍam vā rudhitam vā an apaloketvā saṅgham vā

original: gaṇaṃ vā purisena saddhiṃ ekenekā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya
analyzed: gaṇam vā purisena saddhim ekena ikā bhedāpeyya vā phālāpeyya vā dhovāpeyya vā ālimpāpeyya

original: vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: vā bandhāpeyya vā mocāpeyya vā pācittiyam

original: Ārāmavaggo chaṭṭho.
analyzed: ārāma vaggo chaṭṭho

original: Gabbhinīsikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: gabbhinī sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī gabbhinim vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: pāyantī sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī pāyantim vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyam

analyzed: paṭhama sikkhamāna sikkhāpadam

analyzed: dutiya sikkhamāna sikkhāpadam

original: Paṭhamagihigatasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: paṭhama gihi gata sikkhāpadam

analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī ūna dvādasa vassam gihi gatam vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyam

original: Dutiyagihigatasikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: dutiya gihi gata sikkhāpadam

original: 66. Yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇadvādasavassaṃ gihigataṃ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu asikkhitasikkhaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyaṃ.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī paripuṇṇa dvādasa vassam gihi gatam dve vassāni chasu dhammesu a sikkhita sikkham vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyam

original: Tatiyagihigatasikkhāpadaṃ

original: sammatā, nadiyā sammatā, samudde sammatā, jātassare sammatā, sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena

original: sammatā, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā”ti imā hi “ekādasahi ākārehi sīmato
analyzed: sammatā sīmāya sīmam ajjhottharantena sammatā ati imāḥ hi ekādasahi ākārehi sīmataḥ

original: kammāni vipajjantī”ti vacanato ekādasa vipattisīmāyo nāma. Tattha atikhuddakā nāma
analyzed: kammāni vipajjanti iti vacanato ekādasa vipatti sīmāyaḥ nāma tattha atikhuddakā nāma

original: yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīdituṃ na sakkonti. Atimahatī nāma yā antamaso kesaggamattenāpi
analyzed: yattha ekavīsati bhikkhū nisīditum na sakkonti atimahatī nāma yā antamasaḥ kesagga mattena api

original: tiyojanaṃ atikkamitvā sammatā. Khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭitanimittā vuccati, puratthimāya
analyzed: ti yojanam atikkamitvā sammatā khaṇḍanimittā nāma aghaṭita nimittā vuccati puratthimāya

original: disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā anukkameneva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā
analyzed: disāya nimittam kittetvā anukkamena iva dakkhiṇāya pacchimāya uttarāya disāya kittetvā

original: puna puratthimāya disāya pubbakittitaṃ paṭikittetvā ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati, evaṃ akkhaṇḍanimittā
analyzed: puna puratthimāya disāya pubba kittitam paṭikittetvā ṭhapetum vaṭṭati evam akkhaṇḍa nimittā

original: hoti. Sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittaṃ kittetvā tattheva ṭhapeti,
analyzed: hoti sace pana anukkamena āharitvā uttarāya disāya nimittam kittetvā tattha iva ṭhapeti

original: khaṇḍanimittā nāma hoti. Aparāpi khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā animittupagaṃ tacasārarukkhaṃ
analyzed: khaṇḍanimittā nāma hoti aparā api khaṇḍanimittā nāma yā a nimitta upagam taca sāra rukkham

original: vā khāṇukaṃ vā paṃsupuñjavālukapuñjānaṃ vā aññataraṃ antarā ekaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā.
analyzed: vā khāṇukam vā paṃsu puñja vāluka puñjānam vā aññataram antarā ekam nimittam katvā sammatā

original: Chāyānimittā nāma pabbatacchāyādīnaṃ yaṃ kiñci chāyaṃ nimittaṃ katvā sammatā. Animittā
analyzed: chāyā nimittā nāma pabbata chāyā ādīnam yam kiñci chāyam nimittam katvā sammatā animittā

original: nāma sabbena sabbaṃ nimittāni akittetvā sammatā. Bahisīme ṭhitasammatā nāma nimittāni
analyzed: nāma sabbena sabbam nimittāni a kittetvā sammatāḥ bahisīme ṭhitasammatāḥ nāma nimittāni

original: kittetvā nimittānaṃ bahiṭhitena sammatā. Nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu
analyzed: nimittānam bahiṭhitena sammatā nadiyā samudde jātassare sammatā nāma etesu

original: nadiādīsu sammatā. Sā hi evaṃ sammatāpi “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā, sabbo samuddo
analyzed: nadi ādīsu sammatā sā hi evam sammatā api sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā sabbaḥ samuddaḥ

original: asīmo, sabbo jātassaro asīmo”ti vacanato asammatāva hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ sambhindantena
analyzed: asīmaḥ sabbaḥ jātassaraḥ asīmaḥ ti vacanataḥ asammatā ava hoti sīmāya sīmam sambhindantena

original: sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ sīmaṃ sambhindantena sammatā. Sace hi porāṇakassa
analyzed: sammatā nāma attanaḥ sīmāya paresam sīmam sambhindantena sammatā sace hi porāṇakassa

original: vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ceva jambū cāti dve rukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaviṭapā
analyzed: vihārassa puratthimāya disāya ambo ca iva jambū ca ati dve rukkhā aññam aññam saṃsaṭṭha viṭapā

original: honti, tesu ambassa pacchimadisābhāge jambū, vihārasīmā ca jambuṃ anto katvā ambaṃ
analyzed: honti tesu ambassa pacchima disā bhāge jambū vihāra sīmā ca jambum antar katvā ambam

original: kittetvā baddhā hoti, atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya vihāre kate
analyzed: kittetvā baddhā hoti atha pacchā tassa vihārassa puratthimāya disāya vihāre kate

original: sīmaṃ bandhantā bhikkhū taṃ ambaṃ anto katvā jambuṃ kittetvā bandhanti, sīmāya sīmaṃ
analyzed: sīmam bandhantā bhikkhū tam ambam antar katvā jambum kittetvā bandhanti sīmāya sīmam

original: sambhinnā hoti. Sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma attano sīmāya paresaṃ
analyzed: sambhinnā hoti sīmāya sīmam ajjhottharantena sammatā nāma sīmāya paresam

original: sīmaṃ ajjhottharantena sammatā. Sace hi paresaṃ baddhasīmaṃ sakalaṃ vā tassā padesaṃ
analyzed: sīmam ajjhottharantena sammatā sace hi paresam baddha sīmam sakalam vā tassā padesam

original: vā anto katvā attano sīmaṃ sammannati, sīmāya sīmaṃ ajjhottharitā nāma hoti. Iti
analyzed: vā antar katvā attanaḥ sīmam sammannati sīmāya sīmam ajjhottharitā nāma hoti iti

original: imā ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā sammatā.
analyzed: imāḥ ekādasa vipatti sīmāyaḥ atikkamitvā sammatā

original: Tividhasampattiyuttāti nimittasampattiyā parisāsampattiyā kammavācāsampattiyā ca
analyzed: tividha sampatti yuttā ati nimitta sampattiyā parisā sampattiyā kamma vācā sampattiyā ca

original: yuttā. Tattha nimittasampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbatanimittaṃ, pāsāṇanimittaṃ, vananimittaṃ,
analyzed: yuttā tattha nimitta sampattiyā yuttā nāma pabbata nimittam pāsāṇa nimittam vana nimittam

original: rukkhanimittaṃ, magganimittaṃ, vammikanimittaṃ, nadinimittaṃ, udakanimittanti evaṃ
analyzed: rukkha nimittam magga nimittam vammika nimittam nadi nimittam udaka nimittam ti evam

original: vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge yathāladdhāni nimittupagāni nimittāni
analyzed: vuttesu aṭṭhasu nimittesu tasmin tasmin disā bhāge yathā laddhāni nimitta upagāni nimittāni

original: “puratthimāya disāya kiṃ nimittaṃ, pabbato, bhante, eso pabbato nimitta”ntiādinā
analyzed: puratthimāya disāya kim nimittam pabbataḥ bhante eso pabbataḥ nimitta nti ādinā

original: nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā. Tatrevaṃ saṅkhepato nimittupagatā veditabbā – suddhapaṃsusuddhapāsāṇaubhayamissakavasena
analyzed: nayena sammā kittetvā sammatā tatra evam saṅkhepataḥ nimitta upagatā veditabbā suddha paṃsu suddha pāsāṇa aubhaya missaka vasena

original: hi tividhopi pabbato hatthippamāṇato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ nimittupago, tato omakataro
analyzed: hi tividhaḥ api pabbataḥ hatthi ppamāṇataḥ paṭṭhāya uddham nimitta upagaḥ tatas omakataro

original: na vaṭṭati. Pāsāṇanimitte ayoguḷampi pāsāṇasaṅkhameva gacchati, tasmā yo koci pāsāṇo
analyzed: na vaṭṭati pāsāṇa nimitte ayaḥ guḷam pi pāsāṇa saṅkham eva gacchati tasmai yaḥ koci pāsāṇaḥ

original: ukkaṃsavasena hatthippamāṇato omakataraṃ ādiṃ katvā heṭṭhimaparicchedena dvattiṃsapalaguḷapiṇḍaparimāṇo
analyzed: ukkaṃsa vasena hatthi ppamāṇataḥ omakataram ādim katvā heṭṭhima paricchedena dvattiṃsa pala guḷa piṇḍa parimāṇaḥ

original: nimittupago, na tato khuddakataro. Piṭṭhipāsāṇo pana atimahantopi vaṭṭati. Vananimitte
analyzed: nimitta upagaḥ na tatas khuddakataraḥ piṭṭhi pāsāṇaḥ pana ati mahantaḥ api vaṭṭati vana nimitte

original: antosārehi vā antosāramissakehi vā rukkhehi catupañcarukkhamattampi vanaṃ nimittupagaṃ,
analyzed: antosārehi vā antosāra missakehi vā rukkhehi catu pañca rukkha mattam pi vanam nimitta upagam

original: tato ūnakataraṃ na vaṭṭati. Rukkho jīvantoyeva antosāro bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhito, antamaso
analyzed: tatas ūnakataram na vaṭṭati rukkhaḥ antosāraḥ bhūmiyam patiṭṭhito antamaso

original: ubbedhato aṭṭhaṅgulo, pariṇāhato sūcidaṇḍakappamāṇopi nimittupago, tato omakataro
analyzed: ubbedhataḥ aṭṭha aṅgulo pariṇāhataḥ sūci daṇḍa kappamāṇaḥ api nimitta upago tatas omakataro

original: na vaṭṭati. Maggo jaṅghamaggo vā hotu sakaṭamaggo vā, yo vinivijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāmakhettāni
analyzed: na vaṭṭati maggaḥ jaṅgha maggaḥ vā hotu sakaṭa maggaḥ vā yaḥ vinivijjhitvā dve tīṇi gāma khettāni

original: gacchati, tādiso jaṅghasatthasakaṭasatthehi valañjiyamānoyeva nimittupago, avalañjito
analyzed: gacchati tādisaḥ jaṅghasattha sakaṭasatthehi nimitta upagaḥ a valañjitaḥ

original: na vaṭṭati. Vammiko pana heṭṭhimaparicchedena taṃdivasaṃjāto aṭṭhaṅgulubbedho govisāṇamattopi
analyzed: na vaṭṭati vammikaḥ pana heṭṭhima paricchedena tad divasaṃjātaḥ aṭṭha aṅgulu bbedhaḥ go visāṇa mattaḥ api

original: vammiko nimittupago, tato omakataro na vaṭṭati. Yaṃ pana abaddhasīmālakkhaṇe nadiṃ
analyzed: vammikaḥ nimitta upagaḥ tatas omakataraḥ na vaṭṭati yam pana abaddha sīmā lakkhaṇe nadim

original: vakkhāma, sā nimittupagā, aññā na vaṭṭati. Udakaṃ yaṃ asandamānaṃ āvāṭapokkharaṇītaḷākajātassaraloṇisamuddādīsu
analyzed: vakkhāma sā nimitta upagā aññā na vaṭṭati udakam yam a sandamānam āvāṭa pokkharaṇī taḷāka jātassara loṇi samudda ādīsu

original: ṭhitaṃ, taṃ ādiṃ katvā antamaso taṅkhaṇeyeva pathaviyaṃ khaṇite āvāṭake ghaṭehi āharitvā
analyzed: ṭhitam tam ādim katvā antamasaḥ pathaviyam khaṇite āvāṭake ghaṭehi āharitvā

original: pūritampi yāva kammavācāpariyosānā saṇṭhamānakaṃ nimittupagaṃ, itaraṃ sandamānaṃ
analyzed: pūritam pi yāva kamma vācā pariyosānā saṇṭhamānakam nimitta upagam itaram sandamānam

original: vā vuttaparicchedakālaṃ atiṭṭhantaṃ vā bhājanagataṃ vā na vaṭṭatīti.
analyzed: vā vutta pariccheda kālam a tiṭṭhantam vā bhājana gatam vā na vaṭṭati iti

original: Parisāsampattiyā yuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā
analyzed: parisā sampattiyā yuttā nāma sabbantimena paricchedena catūhi bhikkhūhi sannipatitvā

original: yāvatikā tasmiṃ gāmakhette baddhasīmaṃ vā nadisamuddajātassare vā anokkamitvā ṭhitā
analyzed: yāvatikā tasmim gāma khette baddha sīmam vā nadi samudda jāta ssare vā an ukkamitvā ṭhitā

original: bhikkhū, te sabbe hatthapāse vā katvā chandaṃ vā āharitvā sammatā.
analyzed: bhikkhū te sabbe hattha pāse vā katvā chandam vā āharitvā sammatā

original: Kammavācāsampattiyā yuttā nāma “suṇātu me, bhante, saṅgho, yāvatā samantā nimittā
analyzed: kamma vācā sampattiyā yuttā nāma suṇātu me bhante saṅghaḥ yāvatā samantā nimittā

original: kittitā”tiādinā nayena vuttāya parisuddhāya ñattidutiyakammavācāya sammatā. Evaṃ
analyzed: kitti tā ati ādinā nayena vuttāya parisuddhāya ñatti dutiya kamma vācāya sammatāḥ evam

original: ekādasa vipattisīmāyo atikkamitvā tividhasampattiyuttā nimittena nimittaṃ sambandhitvā
analyzed: ekādasa vipatti sīmāyaḥ atikkamitvā tividha sampatti yuttāḥ nimittena nimittam sambandhitvā

original: sammatā sīmā “baddhasīmā”ti veditabbā. Khaṇḍasīmā samānasaṃvāsasīmā avippavāsasīmāti tassāyeva pabhedo.
analyzed: sammatā sīmā baddha sīmā ati veditabbā khaṇḍa sīmā samāna saṃvāsa sīmā a vippavāsa sīmā ti tassā yeva pabhedaḥ

original: Abaddhasīmā pana gāmasīmā, sattabbhantarasīmā, udakukkhepasīmāti tividhā. Tattha
analyzed: abaddha sīmā pana gāma sīmā satta abbhantara sīmā udakukkhepa sīmā ati tividhā tattha

original: yāvatā ekaṃ gāmakkhettaṃ, ayaṃ gāmasīmā nāma. Agāmake araññe samantā sattabbhantarā
analyzed: yāvatā ekam gāma kkhettam ayam gāmasīmā nāma agāmake araññe samantā satta bhantarā

original: sattabbhantarasīmā nāma. Tattha agāmakaṃ nāma araññaṃ viñjhāṭaviādīsu vā samuddamajjhe
analyzed: nāma tattha agāmakam nāma araññam viñjha aṭavi ādīsu vā samudda majjhe

original: vā macchabandhānaṃ agamanapathesu dīpakesu labbhati. Samantā sattabbhantarāti majjhe
analyzed: vā macchabandhānam a gamana pathesu dīpakesu labbhati samantā majjhe

original: ṭhitānaṃ sabbadisāsu sattabbhantarā vinibbedhena cuddasa honti. Tattha ekaṃ abbhantaraṃ
analyzed: ṭhitānam sabba disāsu satta abbhantarāḥ vinibbedhena cuddasa honti tattha ekam abbhantaram

original: aṭṭhavīsatihatthappamāṇaṃ hoti, ayañca sīmā parisāvasena vaḍḍhati, tasmā samantā
analyzed: aṭṭhavīsati hattha ppamāṇam hoti ayam ca sīmā parisā vasena vaḍḍhati samantā

original: parisāpariyantato paṭṭhāya abbhantaraparicchedo kātabbo. Sace pana dve saṅghā visuṃ
analyzed: parisā pariyantataḥ paṭṭhāya abbhantara paricchedo kātabbo sace pana dve saṅghāḥ visum

original: uposathaṃ karonti, dvinnaṃ sattabbhantarānaṃ antare aññamekaṃ sattabbhantaraṃ upacāratthāya
analyzed: uposatham karonti antare aññam ekam upacāra atthāya

original: ṭhapetabbaṃ. Yā panesā “sabbā, bhikkhave, nadī asīmā”tiādinā nayena nadiādīnaṃ sīmabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ṭhapetabbam yā pana esā sabbā bhikkhave nadī asīmā ati ādinā nayena nadi ādīnam sīma bhāvam

original: paṭikkhipitvā puna “nadiyā vā, bhikkhave, samudde vā jātassare vā yaṃ majjhimassa
analyzed: paṭikkhipitvā puna nadiyāḥ vā bhikkhave samudde vā jātassare vā yam majjhimassa

original: purisassa samantā udakukkhepā, ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathā”ti vuttā ayaṃ
analyzed: purisassa samantā udakukkhepā ayam tattha samāna saṃvāsā eka uposathā ati vuttā ayam

original: udakukkhepasīmā nāma. Tattha yassā dhammikānaṃ rājūnaṃ kāle anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ anudasāhaṃ
analyzed: udakukkhepasīmā nāma tattha yassāḥ dhammikānam rājūnam kāle anvaḍḍha māsam anudasāham

original: anupañcāhaṃ anatikkamitvā deve vassante valāhakesu vigatamattesu sotaṃ pacchijjati,
analyzed: anupañcāham an atikkamitvā deve vassante valāhakesu vigata mattesu sotam pacchijjati

original: ayaṃ nadisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati. Yassā pana īdise suvuṭṭhikāle vassānassa catumāse
analyzed: ayam nadi saṅkhyam na gacchati yassā pana īdise su vuṭṭhi kāle vassānassa catu māse

original: sotaṃ na pacchijjati, yattha titthena vā atitthena vā sikkhākaraṇīye āgatalakkhaṇena
analyzed: sotam na pacchijjati yattha titthena vā a titthena vā sikkhākaraṇīye āgata lakkhaṇena

original: timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakaṃ anukkhipitvā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā ekadvaṅgulamattampi
analyzed: ti maṇḍalam paṭicchādetvā antaravāsakam an ukkhipitvā uttarantiyā bhikkhuniyā eka dvaṅgula mattam pi

original: antaravāsako temiyati, ayaṃ samuddaṃ vā pavisatu taḷākaṃ vā, pabhavato paṭṭhāya nadī
analyzed: antaravāsakaḥ temiyati ayam samuddam vā pavisatu taḷākam vā pabhavataḥ paṭṭhāya nadī

original: nāma. Samuddo pākaṭoyeva. Yo pana kenaci khaṇitvā akato sayaṃjāto sobbho samantato
analyzed: nāma samuddaḥ pākaṭaḥ yā iva yaḥ pana kenacid khaṇitvā a kataḥ sayaṃjātaḥ sobbho samantataḥ

original: āgatena udakena pūrito tiṭṭhati, yattha nadiyaṃ vuttappakāre vassakāle udakaṃ santiṭṭhati,
analyzed: āgatena udakena pūritaḥ tiṭṭhati yattha nadiyam vutta ppakāre vassa kāle udakam santiṭṭhati

original: ayaṃ jātassaro nāma. Yopi nadiṃ vā samuddaṃ vā bhinditvā nikkhantaudakena khato sobbho
analyzed: ayam jātassaraḥ nāma yaḥ api nadim vā samuddam vā bhinditvā nikkhanta odakena khato sobbho

original: etaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayampi jātassaroyeva.
analyzed: etam lakkhaṇam pāpuṇāti ayam pi jāta ssaroyā iva

original: Yaṃ majjhimassa purisassa samantā udakukkhepāti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ thāmamajjhimassa purisassa
analyzed: yam majjhimassa purisassa samantā yam ṭhānam thāma majjhimassa purisassa

original: samantato udakukkhepena paricchinnaṃ, tattha yathā akkhadhuttā dāruguḷaṃ khipanti,
analyzed: samantataḥ udakukkhepena paricchinnam tattha yathā akkhadhuttāḥ dāru guḷam khipanti

original: evaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbaṃ,
analyzed: evam udakam vā vālukam vā hatthena gahetvā majjhimena purisena sabbathāmena khipitabbam

original: tattha yattha evaṃ khittaṃ udakaṃ vā vālukaṃ vā patati, ayaṃ udakukkhepo nāma.
analyzed: tattha yattha evam khittam udakam vā vālukam vā patati ayam udakukkhepaḥ nāma

original: Ayaṃ tattha samānasaṃvāsā ekūposathāti ayaṃ tesu nadiādīsu udakukkhepaparicchinnā
analyzed: ayam tattha samāna saṃvāsā eka uposathā ati ayam tesu nadi ādīsu uda kukkhepa paricchinnā

original: sīmā samānasaṃvāsā ceva ekūposathā ca, ayaṃ pana etesaṃ nadiādīnaṃ antoyeva labbhati,
analyzed: sīmā samāna saṃvāsā ca iva eka uposathā ca ayam pana etesam nadi ādīnam labbhati

original: na bahi. Tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakaṃ padesaṃ pakativassakāle catūsu māsesu
analyzed: na bahi tasmā nadiyā vā jātassare vā yattakam padesam pakativassa kāle catūsu māsesu

original: udakaṃ ottharati, samudde yasmiṃ padese pakativīciyo ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti, tato
analyzed: udakam ottharati samudde yasmin padese pakati vīciyaḥ ottharitvā saṇṭhahanti tatas

original: paṭṭhāya kappiyabhūmi, tattha ṭhatvā uposathādikammaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Dubbuṭṭhikāle
analyzed: paṭṭhāya kappiya bhūmi tattha ṭhatvā uposatha ādi kammam kātum vaṭṭati dubbuṭṭhi kāle

original: vā gimhe vā nadijātassaresu sukkhesupi sā eva kappiyabhūmi, sace pana sukkhe jātassare

original: tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ adinnādānasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā chahipi samuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti ayam adinnādānasamuṭṭhānā nāma yā samuṭṭhāti

original: ayaṃ sañcarittasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā chaṭṭheneva samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: ayam sañcaritta samuṭṭhānā nāma yā chaṭṭhena iva samuṭṭhāti ayam samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānā

original: nāma. Yā tatiyachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ kathinasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā paṭhamacatutthehi
analyzed: nāma yā tatiya chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti ayam kathinasamuṭṭhānā nāma yā paṭhama catutthehi

original: samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā dutiyapañcamehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ padasodhammasamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti ayam eḷakalomasamuṭṭhānā nāma yā dutiya pañcamehi samuṭṭhāti ayam pada sodhamma samuṭṭhānā

original: nāma. Yā paṭhamatatiyacatutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ addhānasamuṭṭhānā nāma.
analyzed: nāma yā paṭhama tatiya catuttha chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti ayam addhānasamuṭṭhānā nāma

original: Yā catutthachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā pañcameneva
analyzed: yā catuttha chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti ayam theyyasatthasamuṭṭhānā nāma yā pañcamena iva

original: samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti,
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti ayam dhamma desanā samuṭṭhānā nāma yā acittakehi tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: ayaṃ bhūtārocanasamuṭṭhānā nāma. Yā pañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ corivuṭṭhāpanasamuṭṭhānā
analyzed: ayam bhūta ārocana samuṭṭhānā nāma yā pañcama chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti ayam cori vuṭṭhāpana samuṭṭhānā

original: nāma. Yā dutiyatatiyapañcamachaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti, ayaṃ ananuññātasamuṭṭhānā nāmāti.
analyzed: nāma yā dutiya tatiya pañcama chaṭṭhehi samuṭṭhāti ayam ananuññāta samuṭṭhānā nāma ati

original: Iti imassa samuṭṭhānavidhinopi vasena sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: iti imassa samuṭṭhāna vidhinā api vasena sabbattha vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Kiriyāsaññācittehi nānattanti etehi kiriyādīhi sabbāpattīnaṃ nānābhāvaṃ ñatvā sabbattha
analyzed: kiriyā saññā cittehi etehi kiriyā ādīhi sabba āpattīnam nānābhāvam ñatvā sabbattha

original: vinicchayo veditabbo. Sabbāpattiyo hi kiriyāvasena pañcavidhā honti, seyyathidaṃ
analyzed: vinicchayaḥ veditabbo sabba āpattiyaḥ hi kiriyā vasena pañcavidhāḥ honti sā iyyathidam

original: – atthāpatti kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, atthi akiriyato, atthi kiriyākiriyato, atthi siyā
analyzed: atthāpatti kiriyato samuṭṭhāti atthi akiriyato atthi kiriyā akiriyato atthi siyā

original: kiriyato siyā akiriyato, atthi siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyatoti. Tattha yā kāyena
analyzed: kiriyataḥ siyā a kiriyataḥ atthi siyā kiriyataḥ siyā kiriyā a kiriyato ti tattha yā kāyena

original: vā vācāya vā pathavikhaṇanādīsu viya vītikkamaṃ karontassa hoti, ayaṃ kiriyato samuṭṭhāti
analyzed: vā vācāya vā pathavi khaṇana ādīsu viya vītikkamam karontassa hoti ayam kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti

original: nāma. Yā kāyavācāhi kattabbaṃ akarontassa hoti paṭhamakathināpatti viya, ayaṃ akiriyato
analyzed: nāma yā kāya vācāhi kattabbam a karontassa hoti viya ayam

original: samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā karontassa ca akarontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti nāma yā karontassa ca a karontassa ca hoti aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato

original: cīvarappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa
analyzed: cīvara paṭiggahaṇa āpatti viya ayam kiriyā akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma yā siyā karontassa

original: ca, siyā akarontassa ca hoti rūpiyappaṭiggahaṇāpatti viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā
analyzed: ca siyā a karontassa ca hoti rūpiya paṭiggahaṇa āpatti viya ayam siyā kiriyataḥ siyā

original: akiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma. Yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karontākarontassa ca hoti kuṭikārāpatti
analyzed: a kiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma yā siyā karontassa ca siyā karonta a karontassa ca hoti kuṭi kārā āpatti

original: viya, ayaṃ siyā kiriyato siyā kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti nāma.
analyzed: ayam siyā kiriyataḥ siyā kiriyā a kiriyataḥ samuṭṭhāti nāma

original: Sabbāpattiyo ca saññāvasena duvidhā honti saññāvimokkhā nosaññāvimokkhāti. Tattha
analyzed: sabba āpattiyo ca saññā vasena duvidhāḥ honti saññā vimokkhā nosaññā vimokkhā ti tattha

original: yato vītikkamasaññāya abhāvena muccati, ayaṃ saññāvimokkhā, itarā nosaññāvimokkhā.
analyzed: yatas vītikkama saññāya abhāvena muccati ayam saññā vimokkhā itarā no saññā vimokkhā

original: Puna ca sabbāpi cittavasena duvidhā honti sacittakā acittakā cāti. Tattha yā sacittakasamuṭṭhānavaseneva
analyzed: puna ca sabbā api citta vasena duvidhā honti sa cittakā acittakā ca ati tattha yā sa cittaka samuṭṭhāna vasena iva

original: samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ sacittakā. Yā acittakena vā sacittakamissakena vā samuṭṭhāti ayaṃ acittakā.
analyzed: samuṭṭhāti ayam sa cittakā yā acittakena vā sa cittaka missakena vā samuṭṭhāti ayam acittakā

original: Vajjakammappabhedanti ettha sabbāpattiyo vajjavasena duvidhā honti lokavajjā paṇṇattivajjā
analyzed: vajja kamma ppabhedam ti ettha sabba āpattiyaḥ vajja vasena duvidhāḥ honti loka vajjā paṇṇatti vajjā

original: cāti. Tattha yassā sacittakapakkhe cittaṃ akusalameva hoti, ayaṃ lokavajjā, sesā
analyzed: ca ati tattha yassā sa cittaka pakkhe cittam akusalam eva hoti ayam loka vajjā sesā

original: paṇṇattivajjā. Sabbā ca kāyakammavacīkammatadubhayavasena tividhā honti. Tattha kāyadvāre
analyzed: paṇṇatti vajjā sabbā ca kāya kamma vacī kamma tad ubhaya vasena tividhāḥ honti tattha kāya dvāre

original: āpajjitabbā kāyakammanti vuccati, vacīdvāre āpajjitabbā vacīkammanti vuccati, ubhayattha
analyzed: āpajjitabbā kāya kamman ti vuccati vacī dvāre āpajjitabbā vacī kamman ti vuccati ubhayattha

original: āpajjitabbā kāyakammaṃ vacīkammañcāti, manodvāre āpatti nāma natthi. Iti iminā vajjakammappabhedenāpi
analyzed: āpajjitabbā kāya kammam vacī kammañca ati manaḥ dvāre āpatti nāma natthi iti iminā vajja kamma ppabhedena api

original: sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: sabbattha vinicchayaḥ veditabbaḥ

original: Tikadvayavidhinti kusalattikavedanāttikavidhiṃ. Āpattiṃ āpajjamāno hi akusalacitto
analyzed: tika dvaya vidhim ti kusala ttika vedanā ttika vidhim āpattim āpajjamānaḥ hi akusala cittaḥ

original: vā āpajjati kusalābyākatacitto vā, tathā dukkhavedanāsamaṅgī vā itaravedanādvayasamaṅgī
analyzed: vā āpajjati kusala abyākata cittaḥ vā tathā dukkha vedanā samaṅgī vā itara vedanā dvaya samaṅgī

original: vā. Evaṃ santepi sabbasikkhāpadesu akusalacittavasena ekaṃ cittaṃ, kusalābyākatacittavasena
analyzed: vā evam sante pi sabba sikkhāpadesu akusala citta vasena ekam cittam kusala abyākata citta vasena

original: dve cittāni, sabbesaṃ vasena tīṇi cittāni. Dukkhavedanāvasena ekā vedanā, sukhaupekkhāvasena
analyzed: dve cittāni sabbesam vasena tīṇi cittāni dukkha vedanā vasena ekā vedanā sukha aupekkhā vasena

original: dve, sabbāsaṃ vasena tisso vedanāti. Ayameva pabhedo labbhati, na añño.
analyzed: dve sabbāsam vasena tissaḥ vedanā ti ayam eva pabhedaḥ labbhati na aññaḥ

original: Lakkhaṇaṃ sattarasadhā, ṭhitaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ idaṃ, ñatvāti idaṃ nidānādivedanāttikapariyosānaṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇam sattarasadhā ṭhitam sādhāraṇam idam ñatvā ati idam nidāna ādi vedanā attika pariyosānam

original: sattarasappakāraṃ lakkhaṇaṃ jānitvā yojeyya medhāvī. Tattha tattha yathārahanti paṇḍito
analyzed: satta rasa ppakāram lakkhaṇam jānitvā yojeyya medhāvī tattha tattha yathā ārahanti paṇḍito

original: bhikkhu tasmiṃ tasmiṃ sikkhāpade idaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yathānurūpaṃ yojeyyāti attho. Taṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu tasmim tasmim sikkhāpade idam lakkhaṇam yathānurūpam yojeyya ati attho tam

original: pana ayojitaṃ dubbijānaṃ hoti, tasmā naṃ sabbasikkhāpadānaṃ asādhāraṇavinicchayapariyosāne
analyzed: pana a yojitam dubbijānam hoti tasmā nam sabba sikkhāpadānam asādhāraṇa vinicchaya pariyosāne

original: imaṃ mātikaṃ anuddharitvāva yojetvā dassayissāma.
analyzed: imam mātikam an uddharitvā ava yojetvā dassayissāma

original: Idha panassa ayaṃ yojanā – idaṃ vesāliyaṃ sudinnattheraṃ ārabbha methunavītikkamavatthusmiṃ
analyzed: idha pana assa ayam yojanā idam vesāliyam sudinna theram ārabbha methuna vītikkama vatthusmiṃ

original: paññattaṃ. “Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiseveyyā”ti ayamettha paññatti, “sikkhaṃ apaccakkhāyā”ti
analyzed: paññattam methunam dhammam paṭiseveyya ati ayam ettha paññatti sikkham a paccakkhāya ati

original: ca “antamaso tiracchānagatāyapī”ti ca dve anupaññattiyo. Anupaññatti ca nāmesā āpattikarā
analyzed: ca tiracchāna gatāya pi iti ca dve anupaññattiyaḥ ca nāma isā āpatti karā

original: ca hoti aññavādakasikkhāpadādīsu viya, anāpattikarā ca aññatra supinantātiādīsu viya,
analyzed: ca hoti aññavādaka sikkhāpada ādīsu viya anāpatti karā ca aññatra

original: āpattiupatthambhakarā ca adinnādānādīsu viya, idha pana upatthambhakarāti veditabbā.
analyzed: āpatti upatthambha karā ca adinnādāna ādīsu viya idha pana upatthambha karā ti veditabbā

original: Ito paraṃ pana yattha anupaññatti atthi, tattha “ayaṃ anupaññattī”ti ettakameva dassayissāma.
analyzed: ito param pana yattha anupaññatti atthi tattha ayam anupaññatti iti ettakam eva dassayissāma

original: Ṭhapetvā pana anupaññattiṃ avasesā paññattiyevāti sabbattha vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: ṭhapetvā pana anupaññattim avasesā paññattiyā iva ati sabbattha vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Bhikkhuṃ ārabbha uppannavatthusmiṃyeva “yā pana bhikkhunī chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhum ārabbha uppanna vatthusmiṃ yeva yā pana bhikkhunī chandasaḥ methunam dhammaṃ

original: paṭiseveyyā”ti evaṃ bhikkhunīnampi paññattito sādhāraṇapaññatti. Āṇattiyā anāpajjanato
analyzed: paṭiseveyya ti evam bhikkhunīnam pi paññattitaḥ sādhāraṇa paññatti āṇattiyāḥ an āpajjanato

original: anāṇattikaṃ. Bhikkhuṃ pana āṇāpento akappiyasamādānāpattito na muccati, methunarāgena
analyzed: an āṇattikam bhikkhum pana āṇāpentaḥ akappiya samādāna āpattitaḥ na muccati methuna rāgena

original: kāyasaṃsagge dukkaṭaṃ, jīvamānakasarīrassa vuttappakāre magge sacepi tacādīni anavasesetvā
analyzed: kāya saṃsagge dukkaṭam jīvamānaka sarīrassa vutta ppakāre magge sace pi taca ādīni an avasesetvā

original: sabbaso chinne nimittasaṇṭhānamattaṃ paññāyati, tattha antamaso aṅgajāte uṭṭhitaṃ
analyzed: sabbasas chinne nimitta saṇṭhāna mattam paññāyati tattha antamasaḥ aṅga jāte uṭṭhitam

original: anaṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ pīḷakaṃ vā cammakhilaṃ vā pavesentassāpi sevanacitte sati pārājikaṃ,
analyzed: an aṭṭha kāya ppasādam pīḷakam vā camma khilam vā pavesentassa api sevana citte sati pārājikam

original: naṭṭhakāyappasādaṃ sukkhapīḷakaṃ vā matacammaṃ vā lomaṃ vā pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ,
analyzed: naṭṭha kāya ppasādam sukkha pīḷakam vā mata cammam vā lomam vā pavesentassa dukkaṭam

original: sace nimittasaṇṭhānamattampi anavasesetvā sabbaso maggo uppāṭito, tattha upakkamato
analyzed: sace nimitta saṇṭhāna mattam pi an avasesetvā sabbasas maggaḥ uppāṭitaḥ tattha upakkamataḥ

original: vaṇasaṅkhepavasena thullaccayaṃ, tathā manussānaṃ akkhināsākaṇṇacchiddavatthikosesu
analyzed: vaṇa saṅkhepa vasena thullaccayam tathā manussānam akkhi nāsā kaṇṇa chidda vatthi kosesu

original: satthakena katavaṇe vā, hatthiassādīnañca tiracchānānaṃ vatthikosanāsāpuṭesu thullaccayaṃ.
analyzed: satthakena kata vaṇe vā hatthi assa ādīnam ca tiracchānānam vatthi kosa nāsā puṭesu thullaccayam

original: Tiracchānānaṃ pana akkhikaṇṇanāsāvaṇesu ahimacchādīnaṃ pavesanappamāṇavirahite aṇunimitte
analyzed: tiracchānānam pana akkhi kaṇṇa nāsāvaṇesu ahimaccha ādīnam pavesana pamāṇa virahite aṇu nimitte

original: sabbesañca upakacchakādīsu sesasarīresu dukkaṭaṃ. Matasarīre nimitte upaḍḍhakkhāyitato
analyzed: sabbesam ca upakacchaka ādīsu sesa sarīresu dukkaṭam mata sarīre nimitte

original: paṭṭhāya yāva na kuthitaṃ hoti, tāva thullaccayaṃ. Kuthite dukkaṭaṃ, tathā vaṭṭakate
analyzed: paṭṭhāya yāva na kuthitam hoti tāva thullaccayam kuthite dukkaṭam tathā

original: mukhe acchupantaṃ aṅgajātaṃ pavesentassa dukkaṭaṃ. Oṭṭhato bahi nikkhantajivhāya
analyzed: mukhe acchupantam aṅga jātam pavesentassa dukkaṭam oṭṭhataḥ bahi nikkhanta jivhāya

original: vā dantesu vā thullaccayaṃ. Nimittato bahi patitamaṃsapesiyaṃ dukkaṭanti ayamettha āpattibhedo.
analyzed: vā dantesu vā thullaccayam nimittataḥ bahi patita maṃsapesiyam dukkaṭam ti ayam ettha āpatti bhedaḥ

original: Ajānantassa asādiyantassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikānañca
analyzed: a jānantassa a sādiyantassa ummattakassa khitta cittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikānaṃ ca

original: anāpatti. Ettha pana yo niddaṃ okkantattā parena katampi upakkamaṃ na jānāti, so
analyzed: anāpatti ettha pana yaḥ niddam okkanta ttā parena katam pi upakkamam na jānāti so

original: ajānanto. Yo jānitvāpi na sādiyati, so asādiyanto. Yo pittavasena atekicchaṃ ummādaṃ
analyzed: a jānantaḥ yaḥ jānitvā api na sādiyati saḥ pitta vasena atekiccham ummādam

original: patto, so ummattako. Yakkhehi katacittavikkhepo khittacitto. Dvinnampi ca etesaṃ
analyzed: patto saḥ ummattakaḥ yakkhehi kata citta vikkhepaḥ khitta cittaḥ dvinnam pi ca etesam

original: aggisuvaṇṇagūthacandanādīsu samappavattibhāvena ajānanabhāvova pamāṇaṃ. Yo adhimattavedanāya
analyzed: aggi suvaṇṇa gūtha candana ādīsu sama ppavatti bhāvena pamāṇam yaḥ adhimatta vedanāya

original: āturattā kiñci na jānāti, so vedanāṭṭo. Yo tasmiṃ tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ ādibhūto, so
analyzed: ātura ttā kiñci na jānāti so yaḥ tasmin tasmin vatthusmin ādi bhūto so

original: ādikammiko. Ayaṃ pana anāpatti. Catūsu vipattīsu sīlavipatti. Tassā dve aṅgāni sevanacittañca
analyzed: ādikammikaḥ ayam pana anāpatti catūsu vipattīsu sīla vipatti tassāḥ dve aṅgāni sevana cittam ca

original: maggena maggapaṭipādanañcāti. Samuṭṭhānādito idaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: maggena magga paṭipādanam ca ati samuṭṭhāna āditaḥ idam sikkhāpadam paṭhama pārājika samuṭṭhānam

original: kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ, sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dvivedananti,
analyzed: kiriyam saññā vimokkham sa cittakam lokavajjam kāya kammam akusala cittam dvi vedanam ti

original: imāni ca samuṭṭhānādīni nāma āpattiyā honti, na sikkhāpadassa. Vohārasukhatthaṃ pana
analyzed: imāni ca samuṭṭhāna ādīni nāma āpattiyā honti na sikkhāpadassa vohāra sukha attham pana

analyzed: sabba ṭṭhakathāsu sikkhāpada sīsena desanā āgatā tasmai aññesu pi evarūpesu ṭhānesu

original: byañjane ādaraṃ akatvā adhippetameva gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: byañjane ādaram a katvā adhippetam eva gahetabbam

original: Atthañhi nātho saraṇaṃ avoca;
analyzed: atthan hi nātho saraṇam avoca

original: Na byañjanaṃ lokahito mahesī.
analyzed: na byañjanam loka hitaḥ mahā īsī

original: Tasmā akatvā ratimakkharesu;
analyzed: tasmai a katvā rati makkharesu

original: Atthe niveseyya matiṃ mutīmāti.
analyzed: atthe niveseyya matim mutīmāti

original: Paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: paṭhama pārājika vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2. Dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya pārājika vaṇṇanā

original: Dutiye gāmā vā araññāvāti ettha sabbopi ekakuṭikādibhedo parikkhitto vā aparikkhitto
analyzed: dutiye gāmā vā araññā vā ti ettha sabbaḥ pi eka kuṭikā ādi bhedaḥ parikkhittaḥ vā a parikkhittaḥ

original: vā samanusso vā amanusso vā antamaso atirekacātumāsaniviṭṭho yo koci satthopi “gāmo”ti

original: veditabbo. Ṭhapetvā gāmañca gāmūpacārañca avasesaṃ araññaṃ nāma. Tattha asammohatthaṃ

original: viya dassāmi, no ce passissanti, harissāmī”ti parikappeti, tassa taṃ ādāya parikappitaparicchedaṃ

original: atikkantamatte avahāro hoti. Iti yvāyaṃ vuttanayeneva pavatto parikappo, ayaṃ okāsaparikappo
analyzed: atikkanta matte avahāraḥ hoti iti yvā ayam vutta nayena iva pavatto parikappo ayam okāsa parikappo

original: nāma. Evamimesaṃ dvinnampi parikappānaṃ vasena parikappetvā gaṇhato avahāro “parikappāvahāro”ti veditabbo.
analyzed: nāma evam imesam dvinnam pi parikappānam vasena parikappetvā gaṇhataḥ avahāraḥ parikappāvahāro ti veditabbo

original: Paṭicchādetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ paṭicchannāvahāro nāma. So evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu
analyzed: paṭicchādetvā pana avaharaṇam paṭicchannāvahāraḥ nāma saḥ evam veditabbaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu

original: uyyānādīsu paresaṃ omuñcitvā ṭhapitaaṅgulimuddikādīni disvā “pacchā gaṇhissāmī”ti
analyzed: uyyāna ādīsu paresam omuñcitvā ṭhapita aṅguli muddikā ādīni disvā pacchā gaṇhissāmi iti

original: paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti, tassa ettāvatā uddhāro natthīti na tāva avahāro
analyzed: paṃsunā vā paṇṇena vā paṭicchādeti tassa ettāvatā uddhāraḥ natthi iti na tāva avahāro

original: hoti. Yadā pana sāmikā vicinantā apassitvā “sve jānissāmā”ti sālayāva gatā honti,
analyzed: hoti yadā pana sāmikāḥ vicinantāḥ a passitvā sve jānissāma ati sālayā ava gatāḥ honti

original: athassa taṃ uddharato uddhāre avahāro. Paṭicchannakāleyeva “etaṃ mama santaka”nti
analyzed: athassa tam uddharataḥ uddhāre avahāraḥ etam mama santakanti

original: sakasaññāya vā “gatā dāni te, chaṭṭitabhaṇḍaṃ ida”nti paṃsukūlasaññāya vā gaṇhantassa
analyzed: saka saññāya vā gatāḥ dāni te chaṭṭita bhaṇḍam idanti paṃsukūla saññāya vā gaṇhantassa

original: pana bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ. Tesu dutiyatatiyadivase āgantvā vicinitvā adisvā dhuranikkhepaṃ
analyzed: pana bhaṇḍa deyyam tesu dutiya tatiya divase āgantvā vicinitvā a disvā dhura nikkhepam

original: katvā gatesupi gahitaṃ bhaṇḍadeyyameva. Pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa adadato sāmikānaṃ
analyzed: katvā gatesu pi gahitam bhaṇḍa deyyam eva pacchā ñatvā codiyamānassa a dadataḥ sāmikānam

original: dhuranikkhepe avahāro hoti. Kasmā? Yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭhaṃ. Yo pana
analyzed: dhura nikkhepe avahāraḥ hoti kasmā yasmā tassa payogena tehi na diṭṭham yaḥ pana

original: tathārūpaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva appaṭicchādetvā theyyacitto pādena akkamitvā
analyzed: tathārūpam bhaṇḍam yathā ṭhāne ṭhitaṃyeva a paṭicchādetvā theyya cittaḥ pādena akkamitvā

original: kaddame vā vālukāya vā paveseti, tassa pavesitamatteyeva avahāro.
analyzed: kaddame vā vālukāya vā paveseti tassa avahāraḥ

original: Kusaṃ saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇaṃ kusāvahāro nāma. Sopi evaṃ veditabbo – yo bhikkhu
analyzed: kusam saṅkāmetvā pana avaharaṇam kusāvahāraḥ nāma saḥ api evam veditabbaḥ yaḥ bhikkhu

original: vilīvamayaṃ vā tālapaṇṇamayaṃ vā katasaññāṇaṃ yaṃkiñci kusaṃ pātetvā cīvare bhājīyamāne
analyzed: vilīva mayam vā tālapaṇṇa mayam vā kata saññāṇam yaṃkiñci kusam pātetvā cīvare bhājīyamāne

original: attano koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitaṃ appagghataraṃ vā mahagghataraṃ vā samasamaṃ vā agghena
analyzed: attano koṭṭhāsassa samīpe ṭhitam appagghataram vā mahagghataram vā samasamam vā agghena

original: parassa koṭṭhāsaṃ haritukāmo attano koṭṭhāse patitaṃ kusaṃ parassa koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya
analyzed: parassa koṭṭhāsam haritu kāmaḥ attanaḥ koṭṭhāse patitam kusam parassa koṭṭhāse pātetu kāma tāya

original: uddharati, rakkhati tāva. Parassa koṭṭhāse pātite rakkhateva. Yadā pana tasmiṃ patite
analyzed: uddharati rakkhati tāva parassa koṭṭhāse pātite rakkhatā iva yadā pana tasmin patite

original: parassa koṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati, uddhatamatte avahāro. Sace paṭhamataraṃ
analyzed: parassa koṭṭhāsataḥ parassa kusam uddharati uddhata matte avahāro sace paṭhamataram

original: parakoṭṭhāsato parassa kusaṃ uddharati, attano koṭṭhāse pātetukāmatāya uddhāre rakkhati,
analyzed: para koṭṭhāsataḥ parassa kusam uddharati attanaḥ koṭṭhāse pātetu kāma tāya uddhāre rakkhati

original: pātanepi rakkhati, attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusaṃ uddharato uddhāreyeva rakkhati,
analyzed: pātane pi rakkhati attano koṭṭhāsato pana attano kusam uddharataḥ uddhāreya iva rakkhati

original: taṃ uddharitvā parakoṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthato muttamatte avahāro. Ayaṃ kusāvahāro.
analyzed: tam uddharitvā para koṭṭhāse pātentassa hatthataḥ mutta matte avahāraḥ ayam kusa avahāraḥ

original: Iti yaṃ vuttaṃ “ādiyeyyāti pañcavīsatiyā avahārānaṃ aññataravasena hareyyā”ti, tassattho pakāsito hoti.
analyzed: iti yam vuttam ādiyeyya ati pañcavīsatiyāḥ avahārānam aññatara vasena hareyya ati tassa atthaḥ pakāsitaḥ hoti

original: Yathārūpeti yādise. Adinnādāneti adinnassa parasantakassa gahaṇe. Rājānotiidaṃ bimbisāraṃyeva
analyzed: yathārūpā iti a dinnassa para santakassa gahaṇe

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ, aññe pana tathā kareyyuṃ vā na kareyyuṃ vāti te nappamāṇaṃ. Haneyyuṃ
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam aññe pana tathā kareyyum vā na kareyyum vā ati te na pamāṇam haneyyum

original: vāti hatthādīhi vā potheyyuṃ, satthena vā chindeyyuṃ. Bandheyyuṃ vāti rajjubandhanādīhi
analyzed: vāti hattha ādīhi vā potheyyum satthena vā chindeyyum bandheyyum vā ati rajju bandhana ādīhi

original: bandheyyuṃ vā. Pabbājeyyuṃ vāti nīhareyyuṃ vā. Corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosīti imehi
analyzed: bandheyyum vā pabbājeyyum vā ati nīhareyyum vā coraḥ asi bālaḥ asi mūḷhaḥ usi thenaḥ usi iti imehi

original: vacanehi paribhāseyyuṃ. Kīdisassa pana adinnassa ādāne rājāno evaṃ karonti? Pādassa
analyzed: vacanehi paribhāseyyum kīdisassa pana adinnassa ādāne rājānaḥ evam karonti pādassa

original: vā pādārahassa vā. Tathārūpaṃ bhikkhu adinnaṃ ādiyamānoti tādisaṃ bhikkhu porāṇakassa
analyzed: vā pādārahassa vā tathārūpam bhikkhu adinnam ādiyamānaḥ ti tādisam bhikkhu porāṇakassa

original: kahāpaṇassa pādaṃ vā pādārahaṃ vā bhaṇḍaṃ adinnaṃ bhūmiādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: kahāpaṇassa pādam vā pāda araham vā bhaṇḍam adinnam bhūmi ādīsu yattha katthaci ṭhitam

original: yaṃkiñci sajīvanijjīvaṃ vuttappakārānaṃ avahārānaṃ yena kenaci avahārena avaharanto
analyzed: yaṃkiñci sa jīva nijjīvam vutta ppakārānam avahārānam yena kenacid avahārena avaharantaḥ

original: pārājiko hoti, ko pana vādo tato atirekatarasminti.
analyzed: pārājikaḥ hoti kaḥ pana vādaḥ tatas atirekatarasmin ti

original: Rājagahe dhaniyattheraṃ ārabbha rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyanavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ,
analyzed: rājagahe dhaniya theram ārabbha raññaḥ dārūni adinnam ādiyana vatthusmim paññattam

analyzed: gamana ādike pubbappayoge dukkaṭam āmasane dukkaṭam pārājika vatthuno phandāpane thullaccayam

original: Ādiyantassa māsake vā ūnamāsake vā dukkaṭaṃ, atirekamāsake vā ūnapañcamāsake vā thullaccayaṃ,
analyzed: ādiyantassa māsake vā ūna māsake vā dukkaṭam atireka māsake vā ūna pañca māsake vā thullaccayam

original: pañcamāsake vā atirekapañcamāsake vā pārājikaṃ. Sabbattha gahaṇakālavasena ca gahaṇadesavasena
