original: Sakasaññissa, vissāsaggāhe, tāvakālike, petapariggahe, tiracchānagatapariggahe, paṃsukūlasaññissa,
analyzed: saka saññissa vissāsa ggāhe tāvakālike peta pariggahe tiracchānagata pariggahe paṃsukūla saññissa

original: ummattakādīnañca anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, aññassa manussajātikassa vasena parapariggahitaṃ,
analyzed: ummattaka ādīnam ca anāpatti sīla vipatti aññassa manussa jātikassa vasena para pariggahitam

original: parapariggahitasaññitā, garuparikkhāro, theyyacittaṃ, vuttappakārānaṃ avahārānaṃ
analyzed: para pariggahita saññi tā garu parikkhāro theyya cittam vutta ppakārānam avahārānam

original: vasena avaharaṇañcāti imānettha pañca aṅgāni. Adinnādānasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
analyzed: vasena avaharaṇam ca ati imāni ettha pañca aṅgāni adinnādāna samuṭṭhānam kiriyam saññā vimokkham

original: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, tivedananti.
analyzed: sa cittakam lokavajjam kāya kammam vacī kammam akusala cittam ti vedanam ti

original: Dutiyapārājikavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dutiya pārājika vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 3. Tatiyapārājikavaṇṇanā
analyzed: tatiya pārājika vaṇṇanā

analyzed: nanti vadhaka cetanāya cetetvā pakappetvā manussa viggahanti kalalataḥ paṭṭhāya jīvamānaka manussa jātika sarīram

original: Jīvitā voropeyyāti kalalakālepi tāpanamaddanehi vā bhesajjasampadānena vā tato vā
analyzed: jīvitā voropeyyāti kalala kālepi tāpana maddanehi vā bhesajja sampadānena vā tatas vā

original: uddhampi tadanurūpena upakkamena jīvitā viyojeyya. Imassa panatthassa āvibhāvatthaṃ
analyzed: tad anurūpena upakkamena jīvitā viyojeyya imassa pana atthassa āvi bhāva attham

original: pāṇo veditabbo, pāṇātipāto veditabbo, pāṇātipātī veditabbo, pāṇātipātassa payogo
analyzed: pāṇaḥ veditabbo pāṇa atipātaḥ veditabbo pāṇa atipātī veditabbo pāṇa atipātassa payogaḥ

original: veditabbo. Tattha pāṇoti vohārato satto, paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ. Pāṇātipātoti
analyzed: veditabbo tattha pāṇaḥ ti vohārato satto paramatthataḥ jīvitindriyam pāṇātipāto ti

original: yāya cetanāya jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti, sā cetanā. Pāṇātipātīti
analyzed: yāya cetanāya jīvitindriya upacchedaka payogam samuṭṭhāpeti sā cetanā pāṇātipātī iti

original: vuttacetanāya samaṅgipuggalo. Pāṇātipātassa payogoti pāṇātipātassa cha payogā sāhatthiko
analyzed: vutta cetanāya samaṅgi puggalo pāṇātipātassa payogo ti pāṇātipātassa cha payogā sāhatthiko

original: nissaggiyo āṇattiko thāvaro vijjāmayo iddhimayoti. Tattha sāhatthikoti sayaṃ mārentassa

original: kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā paharaṇaṃ. Nissaggiyoti dūre ṭhitaṃ māretukāmassa
analyzed: kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā paharaṇam dūre ṭhitam māretu kāmassa

original: kāyena vā kāyappaṭibaddhena vā ususattiyantapāsāṇādīnaṃ nissajjanaṃ. Tattha ekeko
analyzed: kāyena vā kāya paṭibaddhena vā usu satti yanta pāsāṇa ādīnam nissajjanam tattha ekekaḥ

original: uddissānuddissabhedato duvidho. Tattha uddissake yaṃ uddissa paharati, tasseva maraṇena
analyzed: uddissa anuddissa bhedataḥ duvidhaḥ tattha uddissake yam uddissa paharati tassa iva maraṇena

original: kammabaddho. “Yo koci maratū”ti evaṃ anuddissake pahārappaccayā yassa kassaci maraṇena
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ yaḥ koci maratu uti evam anuddissake pahāra ppaccayāḥ yassa kassaci maraṇena

original: kammabaddho. Ubhayatthāpi ca paharitamatte vā maratu, pacchā vā teneva rogena, paharitakkhaṇeyeva
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ ubhayattha api ca paharita matte vā maratu pacchā vā tena iva rogena

original: kammabaddho. Āṇattikoti “asukaṃ nāma mārehī”ti aññaṃ āṇāpentassa āṇāpanaṃ.
analyzed: kamma baddhaḥ āṇattikaḥ ti asukam nāma mārehi iti aññam āṇāpentassa āṇāpanaṃ

original: Tattha –
analyzed: tattha

original: Vatthu kālo ca okāso, āvudhaṃ iriyāpatho;
analyzed: vatthu kālo ca okāsaḥ āvudham iriyāpatho

original: Kriyāvisesoti ime, cha āṇatti niyāmakā.
analyzed: ime cha niyāmakā

original: Tattha vatthūti puggalo. Yañhi puggalaṃ “mārehī”ti āṇatto sace tameva māreti, āṇāpakassa
analyzed: tattha vatthu uti puggalaḥ yat hi puggalam mārehi iti āṇatto sace tam eva māreti āṇāpakassa

original: āpatti. Atha aññaṃ māreti, taṃmaññamāno vā aññaṃ māreti, āṇāpako muccati. “Imaṃ mārehī”ti
analyzed: āpatti atha aññam māreti taṃ maññamānaḥ vā aññam māreti āṇāpakaḥ muccati imam mārehi iti

original: āṇatte pana āṇāpakassa dukkaṭaṃ. Kāloti purebhattādikālo. Sace hi “purebhattaṃ mārehī”ti
analyzed: āṇatte pana āṇāpakassa dukkaṭam kālo ti purebhatta ādi kālo sace hi purebhattam mārehi iti

original: āṇatto purebhattameva māreti, āṇāpakassa āpatti. Atha yaṃ purebhattaṃ niyāmitaṃ,
analyzed: āṇattaḥ purebhattam eva māreti āṇāpakassa āpatti atha yam purebhattam niyāmitam

original: tato pacchā vā pure vā māreti, āṇāpako muccati. Iminā nayena sabbattha vinicchayo
analyzed: tato pacchā vā pure vā māreti āṇāpakaḥ muccati iminā nayena sabbattha vinicchayo

original: veditabbo. Thāvaroti asaṃhārimena upakaraṇena māretukāmassa opātakkhaṇanaṃ apassenasaṃvidhānaṃ
analyzed: veditabbaḥ thāvaraḥ ti a saṃhārimena upakaraṇena māretu kāmassa opāta khaṇanam a passena saṃvidhānam

original: asiādīnaṃ upanikkhipanaṃ taḷākādīsu visasampayojanaṃ rūpūpahārotievamādi. Vuttanayeneva
analyzed: asi ādīnam upanikkhipanam taḷāka ādīsu visa sampayojanam rūpūpahāraḥ ti evamādi vutta nayena iva

original: cetthāpi uddissānuddissabhedo veditabbo. Vijjāmayoti māraṇatthaṃ vijjāparijappanaṃ.
analyzed: ca itthā api uddissa anuddissa bhedaḥ veditabbaḥ vijjā mayaḥ ti māraṇa attham vijjā parijappanam

original: Iddhimayoti kammavipākajāya iddhiyā payojanaṃ.
analyzed: kamma vipāka jāye iddhiyā payojanam

original: Satthahārakaṃ vāssa pariyeseyyāti ettha haratīti hārakaṃ, kiṃ harati? Jīvitaṃ. Atha
analyzed: sattha hārakam vā assa pariyeseyyāti ettha harati iti hārakam kim harati jīvitam atha

original: vā haritabbanti hārakaṃ, upanikkhipitabbanti attho. Satthañca taṃ hārakañcāti satthahārakaṃ.
analyzed: vā haritabbanti hārakam upanikkhipitabbanti attho sattham ca tam hārakam ca ati sattha hārakam

original: Assāti manussaviggahassa. Pariyeseyyāti yathā labhati, tathā kareyya, upanikkhipeyyāti
analyzed: assa ati manussa viggahassa pariyeseyya ati yathā labhati tathā kareyya upanikkhipeyya ati

original: attho. Etena thāvarapayogaṃ dasseti. Itarathā hi pariyiṭṭhimatteyeva pārājiko bhaveyya,
analyzed: etena thāvara payogam dasseti itarathā hi pariyiṭṭhima ttā iya iva pārājikaḥ bhaveyya

original: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ. Padabhājane panassa byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā yaṃ ettha thāvarapayogasaṅgahitaṃ
analyzed: na ca itam yuttam pada bhājane panassa byañjanam an ādiyitvā yam ettha thāvara payoga saṅgahitam

original: satthaṃ, tadeva dassetuṃ “asiṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maraṇavaṇṇaṃ vā saṃvaṇṇeyyāti vācāya
analyzed: sattham tat eva dassetum asim vā atiādi vuttam maraṇa vaṇṇam vā vācāya

original: vā tālapaṇṇādīsu likhitvā vā “yo evaṃ marati, so dhanaṃ vā labhatī”tiādinā nayena
analyzed: vā tāla paṇṇa ādīsu likhitvā vā yaḥ evam marati saḥ dhanam vā labhati iti ādinā nayena

original: maraṇe guṇaṃ pakāseyya. Etena yathā “adinnādāne ādiyeyyā”ti vuttattā pariyāyakathāya
analyzed: maraṇe guṇam pakāseyya etena yathā adinnādāne ādiyeyya ati vutta ttā pariyāya kathāya

original: muccati, nayidha, evaṃ “saṃvaṇṇeyyā”ti vacanato pana idha pariyāyakathāyapi na muccatīti
analyzed: muccati nayidha evam vacanataḥ pana na muccati iti

original: ayamattho veditabbo. Maraṇāya vā samādapeyyāti “satthaṃ vā āharā”tiādinā nayena maraṇatthāya
analyzed: ayam atthaḥ veditabbaḥ maraṇāya vā samādapeyya ati sattham vā āhara ati ādinā nayena maraṇa atthāya

original: upāyaṃ gāhāpeyya. Etena āṇattikappayogaṃ dasseti. Ambho purisāti ālapanametaṃ. Kiṃ

original: purisassa tisso vidatthiyo, vaḍḍhakihatthena diyaḍḍho hattho hoti. Minantena pana
analyzed: purisassa tissaḥ vidatthiyaḥ vaḍḍhaki hatthena diyaḍḍhaḥ hatthaḥ hoti minantena pana

original: kuṭiyā bahikuṭṭe paṭhamaṃ dinnaṃ mahāmattikapariyantaṃ aggahetvā thusapiṇḍapariyantena
analyzed: kuṭiyāḥ bahi kuṭṭe paṭhamam dinnam mahā mattika pariyantam aggahetvā thusapiṇḍa pariyantena

original: dvādasa vidatthiyo minetabbā, sace thusapiṇḍakena anatthiko hoti, mahāmattikalepeneva
analyzed: dvādasa vidatthiyaḥ minetabbā sace thusapiṇḍakena anatthikaḥ hoti mahā mattika lepena iva

original: niṭṭhāpeti, sveva paricchedo. Tiriyanti vitthārato. Sattantarāti kuṭṭassa bahiantaṃ
analyzed: niṭṭhāpeti su eva paricchedaḥ tiriyanti vitthārato kuṭṭassa bahi antam

original: aggahetvā abbhantarimena antena satta sugatavidatthiyo pamāṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Ettha
analyzed: aggahetvā abbhantarimena antena satta sugata vidatthiyaḥ pamāṇanti vuttam hoti ettha

original: ca kesaggamattampi dīghato hāpetvā tiriyaṃ, tiriyato vā hāpetvā dīghaṃ vaḍḍhetuṃ
analyzed: ca kesagga mattam pi dīghataḥ hāpetvā tiriyam tiriyataḥ vā hāpetvā dīgham vaḍḍhetum

original: na vaṭṭati, ko pana vādo ubhatovaḍḍhane. Yā pana dīghato saṭṭhihatthāpi hoti, tiriyato
analyzed: na vaṭṭati kaḥ pana vādaḥ ubhatas vaḍḍhane yā pana dīghataḥ hoti tiriyataḥ

original: tihatthā vā ūnakacatuhatthā vā, yattha pamāṇayutto mañco ito cito ca na parivaṭṭati,
analyzed: ti hatthā vā ūnaka catu hatthā vā pamāṇa yutto mañco itas citas ca na parivaṭṭati

original: pacchimakoṭiyā catuhatthavitthārā na hoti, ayaṃ kuṭisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati, tasmā vaṭṭati.
analyzed: pacchima koṭiyā catu hattha vitthārā na hoti ayam kuṭi saṅkhyam na gacchati tasmai vaṭṭati

original: Bhikkhū abhinetabbā vatthudesanāyāti yasmiṃ padese kuṭiṃ kāretukāmo hoti, taṃ sodhetvā
analyzed: bhikkhū abhinetabbāḥ vatthu desanāya ati yasmin padese kuṭim kāretu kāmo hoti tam sodhetvā

original: padabhājane vuttanayena saṅghaṃ tikkhattuṃ yācitvā sabbe vā saṅghapariyāpannā saṅghena
analyzed: pada bhājane vutta nayena saṅgham tikkhattum yācitvā sabbe vā saṅgha pariyāpannā saṅghena

original: vā sammatā dve tayo bhikkhū tattha vatthudesanatthāya netabbā. Tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu
analyzed: vā sammatāḥ dve tayaḥ bhikkhū tattha vatthu desana tthāya netabbā tehi bhikkhūhi vatthu

original: desetabbaṃ anārambhaṃ saparikkamananti tehi bhikkhūhi kipillikādīnaṃ āsayādīhi terasahi,
analyzed: desetabbam anārambham sa parikkamanam ti tehi bhikkhūhi kipillika ādīnam āsaya ādīhi terasahi

original: pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇanissitādīhi soḷasahi upaddavehi virahitattā anārambhaṃ, dvīhi vā catūhi
analyzed: pubbaṇṇa aparaṇṇa nissita ādīhi soḷasahi upaddavehi virahita ttā anārambham dvīhi vā catūhi

original: vā balibaddhehi yuttena sakaṭena ekaṃ cakkaṃ nibbodakapatanaṭṭhāne ekaṃ bahi katvā
analyzed: vā bali baddhehi yuttena sakaṭena ekam cakkam nibbodaka patanaṭṭhāne ekam bahi katvā

original: āvijjhituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāya saparikkamananti sallakkhetvā sace saṅghapahonakā honti,
analyzed: āvijjhitum sakkuṇeyya tāya sa parikkamananti sallakkhetvā sace saṅgha pahonakāḥ honti

original: tattheva, no ce, saṅghamajjhaṃ gantvā tena bhikkhunā yācitehi ñattidutiyena kammena
analyzed: tattha iva no ce saṅgha majjham gantvā tena bhikkhunā yācitehi ñatti dutiyena kammena

original: vatthu desetabbaṃ. Sārambhe cetiādi paṭipakkhanayena veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: vatthu desetabbam sa ārambhe ca itiādi paṭipakkha nayena veditabbam

original: Āḷaviyaṃ āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha saññācikāya kuṭikaraṇavatthusmiṃ paññattaṃ, asādhāraṇapaññatti,
analyzed: āḷaviyam āḷavike bhikkhū ārabbha saññācikāya kuṭi karaṇa vatthusmim paññattam asādhāraṇa paññatti

original: sāṇattikaṃ, “adesitavatthukaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ kuṭiṃ kāressāmī”ti upakaraṇatthaṃ araññaṃ
analyzed: sāṇattikam a desita vatthukam pamāṇa atikkantam kuṭim kāressāmi iti upakaraṇa attham araññam

original: gamanato paṭṭhāya sabbapayogesu dukkaṭaṃ, “idāni dvīhi piṇḍehi niṭṭhānaṃ gamissatī”ti
analyzed: gamanataḥ paṭṭhāya sabba payogesu dukkaṭam idāni dvīhi piṇḍehi niṭṭhānam gamissati iti

original: tesu paṭhamapiṇḍadāne thullaccayaṃ, dutiyadānena lepe ghaṭite sace adesitavatthukā
analyzed: tesu paṭhama piṇḍa dāne thullaccayam dutiya dānena lepe ghaṭite sace a desita vatthukā

original: eva vā pamāṇātikkantā eva vā hoti, eko saṅghādiseso, dve ca dukkaṭāni. Ubhayavippannā,
analyzed: eva vā pamāṇa atikkantā eva vā hoti ekaḥ saṅgha ādisesaḥ dve ca dukkaṭāni ubhaya vippannā

original: dve saṅghādisesā, dve ca dukkaṭāni. Sace pana dvārabandhaṃ vā vātapānaṃ vā aṭṭhapetvāva
analyzed: dve saṅgha ādisesā dve ca dukkaṭāni sace pana dvāra bandham vā vātapānam vā aṭṭhapetvā ava

original: mattikāya limpati, ṭhapite ca tasmiṃ lepo na ghaṭiyati, rakkhati tāva. Puna limpantassa
analyzed: mattikāya limpati ṭhapite ca tasmin lepaḥ na rakkhati tāva puna limpantassa

original: pana ghaṭitamatte saṅghādiseso. Sace taṃ ṭhapiyamānaṃ paṭhamadinnalepena saddhiṃ
analyzed: pana ghaṭita matte saṅgha ādi sesaḥ sace tam ṭhapiyamānam paṭhama dinna lepena saddhim

original: nirantarameva hutvā tiṭṭhati, paṭhamameva saṅghādiseso. Kevalaṃ sārambhāya dukkaṭaṃ,
analyzed: nirantaram eva hutvā tiṭṭhati paṭhamam eva saṅgha ādi seso kevalam sa ārambhāya dukkaṭam

original: tathā aparikkamanāya. Vippakataṃ kuṭiṃ aññassa dadato ca, bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā bhindantassa
analyzed: tathā a parikkamanāya vippakatam kuṭim aññassa dadataḥ ca bhūmim samam katvā bhindantassa

original: ca, leṇaguhātiṇakuṭipaṇṇacchadanagehesu aññataraṃ kārentassa, kuṭimpi aññassa vāsatthāya,
analyzed: ca leṇa guhā tiṇa kuṭi paṇṇa chadana gehesu aññataram kārentassa aññassa vāsatthāya

original: vāsāgāraṃ ṭhapetvā uposathāgārādīsu aññataratthāya kārentassa ca ummattakādīnañca
analyzed: vāsāgāram ṭhapetvā uposatha āgāra ādīsu aññatara tthāya kārentassa ca ummattaka ādīnam ca

original: anāpatti. Sīlavipatti, ullittādīnaṃ aññataratā, heṭṭhimapamāṇasambhavo, adesitavatthukatā,
analyzed: anāpatti sīla vipatti ullitta ādīnam aññatara tā heṭṭhima pamāṇa sambhavaḥ a desita vatthuka tā

original: pamāṇātikkantatā, attuddesikatā, vāsāgāratā, lepaghaṭanāti imānettha cha vā satta
analyzed: pamāṇa atikkanta tā attuddesika tā vāsāgāra tā lepa ghaṭanā ati imān ettha cha vā satta

original: vā aṅgāni. Chasamuṭṭhānaṃ, kiriyañca, kiriyākiriyañca. Idañhi vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkantaṃ
analyzed: vā aṅgāni cha samuṭṭhānam kiriyam ca kiriyā akiriyam ca idam hi vatthum desāpetvā pamāṇa atikkantam

original: vā karoto kiriyato samuṭṭhāti, adesāpetvā karoto kiriyākiriyato samuṭṭhāti. Sesamettha
analyzed: vā karotaḥ kiriyato samuṭṭhāti a desāpetvā karotaḥ kiriya a kiriyato samuṭṭhāti sesam ettha

original: sañcaritte vuttasadisamevāti.
analyzed: sañcaritte vutta sadisam eva ati

original: Kuṭikārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kuṭikāra sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Vihārakārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: vihārakāra sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Sattame mahallakanti sasāmikabhāvena saññācitakuṭito mahantabhāvo etassa atthīti
analyzed: sattame mahallakanti sa sāmika bhāvena saññā cita kuṭitaḥ mahanta bhāvaḥ etassa atthi iti

original: mahallako, yasmā vā vatthuṃ desāpetvā pamāṇātikkamenāpi kātuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā pamāṇamahantatāyapi
analyzed: mahallakaḥ yasmai vā vatthum desāpetvā pamāṇa atikkamena api kātum vaṭṭati tasmai

original: mahallako, taṃ mahallakaṃ. Yasmā panassa taṃ pamāṇamahantattaṃ sasāmikattāva labbhati,
analyzed: mahallakaḥ tam mahallakam yasmā pana assa tam pamāṇa mahanta ttam sa sāmika ttā ava labbhati

original: tasmā tadatthadassanatthaṃ “mahallako nāma vihāro sasāmiko vuccatī”ti evamassa padabhājane
analyzed: tasmā tad attha dassana attham mahallakaḥ nāma vihāro sa sāmikaḥ vuccati iti evam assa pada bhājane

original: vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ kuṭikārasikkhāpade vuttasadisaṃ, sasāmikabhāvamattameva hi viseso.
analyzed: vuttam sesam sabbam kuṭikāra sikkhāpade vutta sadisam sa sāmika bhāva mattam eva hi visesaḥ

original: Kosambiyaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpanavatthusmiṃ paññattabhāvo, akiriyamattato samuṭṭhānabhāvo, ekasaṅghādisesatā ca ettha viseso.
analyzed: kosambiyam channa theram ārabbha cetiya rukkham chedāpana vatthusmim paññatta bhāvaḥ a kiriya mattataḥ samuṭṭhāna bhāvaḥ eka saṅgha ādi sesa tā ca ettha visesaḥ

original: Vihārakārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vihārakāra sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 8. Duṭṭhadosasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: duṭṭha dosa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Aṭṭhame duṭṭho dosoti dūsito ceva dūsako ca. Uppanne hi dose puggalo tena dosena
analyzed: aṭṭhame duṭṭhaḥ doso ti dūsito ca iva dūsako ca uppanne hi dose puggalo tena dosena

original: dūsito hoti, pakatibhāvaṃ jahāpito, tasmā “duṭṭho”ti vuccati. Parañca dūseti vināseti,

original: tasmā “doso”ti vuccati. Iti “duṭṭho doso”ti ekassevetaṃ puggalassa ākāranānattena
analyzed: tasmā doso ti vuccati iti duṭṭhaḥ doso ti ekassa iva etam puggalassa ākāra nānattena

original: nidassanaṃ. Appatītoti nappatīto, pītisukhādīhi vivajjito, na abhisaṭoti attho. Amūlakenāti
analyzed: nidassanam appatītaḥ ti na patītaḥ pīti sukha ādīhi vivajjitaḥ na abhisaṭaḥ ti atthaḥ amūlakena ati

original: yaṃ codakena cuditakamhi puggale adiṭṭhaṃ assutaṃ aparisaṅkitaṃ, idaṃ etesaṃ dassanasavanaparisaṅkāsaṅkhātānaṃ
analyzed: yam codakena cuditakamhi puggale a diṭṭham a ssutam a parisaṅkitam idam etesam dassana savana parisaṅkā asaṅkhātānam

original: assutaṃ nāma tatheva kenaci vuccamānaṃ na sutaṃ, aparisaṅkitaṃ nāma attano vā parassa

original: vā diṭṭhasutamutavasena cetasā aparisaṅkitaṃ, iti evarūpena amūlakena. Pārājikenāti

original: bhikkhuno anurūpesu ekūnavīsatiyā aññatarena, padabhājane pana pārājikuddese āgatāneva

analyzed: abhibhaveyya tam pana an uddhaṃsanam yasmai attanā codentaḥ api parena codāpentaḥ api karoti

original: tasmāssa padabhājane “codeti vā codāpeti vā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha vatthusandassanā āpattisandassanā
analyzed: tasmā assa pada bhājane codeti vā codāpeti vā ti vuttam tattha vatthu sandassanā āpatti sandassanā

analyzed: saṃvāsa ppaṭikkhepo sāmīci ppaṭikkhepo ti saṅkhepato catasso codanā tāsu vatthu sandassanā

original: nāma “tvaṃ methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevī”tiādinā nayena pavattā. Āpattisandassanā nāma

original: “tvaṃ methunadhammāpattiṃ āpanno”tiādinā nayena pavattā. Saṃvāsappaṭikkhepo nāma

original: “natthi tayā saddhiṃ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavatto. Ettāvatā

original: pana sīsaṃ na eti, “assamaṇosī”tiādīhi vacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ eti. Sāmīcippaṭikkhepo

original: pana “assamaṇosī”tiādivacanehi saddhiṃ ghaṭiteyeva sīsaṃ eti, tasmā yo bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ

original: codāpeti, ayaṃ anuddhaṃseti nāma. Appeva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
analyzed: codāpa iti ayam anuddhaṃsā iti nāma appā iva nāma naṃ imamhā brahmacariyā

original: puggalaṃ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyya”nti iminā adhippāyena anuddhaṃseyyāti vuttaṃ
analyzed: puggalam imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti iminā adhippāyena anuddhaṃseyya ati vuttam

analyzed: satta adhippāyā paṭikkhittāḥ honti tatas aparena samayena ati yasmin samaye an uddhaṃsito

analyzed: samanuggāhīyamānaḥ vā a samanuggāhīyamānaḥ vā bhikkhu ca dosam patiṭṭhāti paṭicca tiṭṭhati

original: paṭijānāti, saṅghādisesoti. Idañca amūlakabhāvassa pākaṭakāladassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.

original: Sīlavipatti, bhedāya parakkamanaṃ, dhammakammena samanubhāsanaṃ, kammavācāpariyosānaṃ,

analyzed: bheda anuvattaka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: vadanti iti vagga vādakāḥ yasmā pana tiṇṇam uddham kammārahā na honti na hi saṅghaḥ

original: evaṃ idha anuvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbanti.

analyzed: bheda anuvattaka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 12. Dubbacasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: dubbaca sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: antar pātimokkhassa vattamānesu iti attho sahadhammikam vuccamānaḥ iti sahadhammikena

analyzed: vuccamānaḥ iti atthaḥ viramatha ayasmantaḥ mama vacanāya ati yena vacanena mama vadatha tatas

analyzed: vacanena vadetu yat idam ti vuddhi kāraṇa dassana atthe nipātaḥ tena yam idam aññamaññassa

original: Sesaṃ uttānatthameva. Vinicchayakathāpi dasame vuttasadisāyeva.

original: Dubbacasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: dubbaca sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Vinicchayakathāpi dasame vuttasadisāyeva.
analyzed: vinicchaya kathā api dasame vutta sadisāya iva

analyzed: nigamana vaṇṇanā

original: Akāmā parivatthabbanti na kāmena na vasena, atha kho akāmena avasena parivāsaṃ samādāya
analyzed: akāmā parivatthabbanti na kāmena na vasena atha kho akāmena avasena parivāsam samādāya

analyzed: vatthabbam tattha paṭicchanna parivāso suddhanta parivāso samodhāna parivāso ca ati tividhaḥ

analyzed: parivāso tattha paṭicchanna parivāso tāva yathā paṭicchannāya āpattiyāḥ dātabbo kassaci

original: vissajjetuṃ vissajjetvā paribhuñjituñca vaṭṭati. Ettha ca purimesu tīsu rāsīsu agarubhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: vissajjetum vissajjetvā paribhuñjitum ca vaṭṭati ettha ca purimesu tīsu rāsīsu agaru bhaṇḍam

original: nāma kiñci natthi, catutthe lohakumbhī arañjarasaṇṭhānaṃ lohabhāṇakaṃ lohakaṭāhanti
analyzed: nāma kiñci natthi catutthe loha kumbhī arañjara saṇṭhānam loha bhāṇakam loha kaṭāhanti

original: imāni tīṇi antamaso pasatamattaudakaggaṇhanakānipi garubhaṇḍāni. Lohavārako pana
analyzed: imāni tīṇi garubhaṇḍāni

original: kāḷalohatambalohakaṃsalohavaṭṭalohānaṃ yena kenaci kato sīhaḷadīpe pādaggaṇhanako
analyzed: yena kenacid kataḥ sīhaḷadīpe

original: bhājetabbo, pādo ca nāma magadhanāḷiyā pañcanāḷimattaṃ gaṇhāti, tato atirekaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ,
analyzed: bhājetabbo pādo ca nāma magadha nāḷiyā pañca nāḷi mattam gaṇhāti tatas atirekam garubhaṇḍam

original: imāni tāva pāḷiyaṃ āgatāni lohabhājanāni.
analyzed: imāni tāva pāḷiyam āgatāni loha bhājanāni

original: Pāḷiyaṃ pana anāgatānipi bhiṅgārapaṭiggahauḷuṅkadabbikaṭacchupāti taṭṭakasarakasamuggaaṅgārakapalladhūmakaṭacchuādīni
analyzed: pāḷiyam pana anāgatāni api taṭṭaka saraka samugga aṅgāraka palla dhūmakaṭacchu ādīni

original: khuddakānipi garubhaṇḍāneva, ayapatto ayathālakaṃ tambalohathālakanti imāni pana
analyzed: khuddakāni pi aya pattaḥ aya thālakam tamba loha thālakanti imāni pana

original: bhājanīyāni, kaṃsalohavaṭṭalohabhājanavikati saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭā vā
analyzed: bhājanīyāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭāḥ vā

original: vaṭṭati, puggalikaparibhogena na vaṭṭati. Ṭhapetvā pana taṃ bhājanavikatiṃ aññasmimpi
analyzed: vaṭṭati puggalika paribhogena na vaṭṭati ṭhapetvā pana tam bhājana vikatim aññasmim pi

original: kappiyalohabhaṇḍe añjanī añjanisalākā natthudānaṃ kaṇṇamalaharaṇī sūci khuddako pipphaliko
analyzed: kappiya loha bhaṇḍe añjanī añjani salākā natthudānam kaṇṇa mala haraṇī sūci khuddako pipphaliko

original: khuddakaṃ ārakaṇṭakaṃ kuñcikā tāḷaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi vedhako bhindivālako yathātathāghanakatalohaṃvippakatalohabhaṇḍañca
analyzed: khuddakam ārakaṇṭakam kuñcikā tāḷam kattara yaṭṭhi vedhakaḥ bhindivālakaḥ yathā tathā ghana kata loham vippa kata loha bhaṇḍam ca

original: sabbaṃ bhājanīyaṃ. Dhūmanettaphāladīparukkhadīpakapallikaolambakadīpaitthipurisatiracchānarūpakāni
analyzed: sabbam bhājanīyam dhūma netta phāla dīpa rukkha dīpaka pallika olambaka dīpa aitthi purisa tiracchāna rūpakāni

original: pana aññāni vā bhitticchadanakavāṭādīsu upanetabbāni, antamaso lohakhilakaṃ upādāya
analyzed: pana aññāni vā bhitti chadana kavāṭa ādīsu upanetabbāni antamasaḥ loha khilakam upādāya

original: sabbānipi lohabhaṇḍāni garubhaṇḍāniyeva, attanā laddhāni pariharitvāpi puggalikaparibhogena
analyzed: sabbāni api loha bhaṇḍāni attanā laddhāni pariharitvā api puggalika paribhogena

original: na paribhuñjitabbāni, saṅghikaparibhogena vā gihivikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti, tipubhaṇḍepi
analyzed: na paribhuñjitabbāni saṅghika paribhogena vā gihi vikaṭāni vā vaṭṭanti tipu bhaṇḍe pi

original: eseva nayo. Khīrapāsāṇamayāni taṭṭakasarakādīni garubhaṇḍāniyeva.
analyzed: khīra pāsāṇa mayāni taṭṭaka saraka ādīni

original: Ghaṭako pana telabhājanaṃ vā pādaggaṇhanakato atirekameva garubhaṇḍaṃ, suvaṇṇarajataārakūṭajātiphalikabhājanāni
analyzed: ghaṭakaḥ pana tela bhājanam vā pādaggaṇhanakataḥ atirekam eva garu bhaṇḍam suvaṇṇa rajata ārakūṭa jātiphalika bhājanāni

original: gihivikaṭānipi na vaṭṭanti. Senāsanaparibhoge pana āmāsampi anāmāsampi sabbaṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: gihi vikaṭāni pi na vaṭṭanti senāsana paribhoge pana āmāsam pi anāmāsam pi sabbam vaṭṭati

original: Vāsiyādīsu pana yāya vāsiyā dantakaṭṭhacchedanaucchutacchanamattato aññaṃ mahākammaṃ
analyzed: vāsiya ādīsu pana yāya vāsiyā aññam mahākammam

original: kātuṃ na sakkā, ayaṃ bhājanīyā. Sesā yena kenaci ākārena katā garubhaṇḍaṃ, parasu
analyzed: kātum na sakkā ayam bhājanīyā sesā yena kenacid ākārena katā garu bhaṇḍam parasu

original: pana antamaso vejjānaṃ sirāvedhakopi garubhaṇḍameva, tathā kuṭhārī. Yā pana āvudhasaṅkhepena
analyzed: pana antamasaḥ sirāvedhakaḥ api garubhaṇḍam eva tathā kuṭhārī yā pana āvudha saṅkhepena

original: katā, ayaṃ anāmāsā, kudālo daṇḍabandhanikhādanaṃ vā agarubhaṇḍaṃ nāma natthi. Sammuñjanidaṇḍakhaṇanakaṃ
analyzed: katā ayam anāmāsā kudālaḥ daṇḍa bandha nikhādanam vā agarubhaṇḍam nāma natthi sammuñjani daṇḍa khaṇanakam

original: pana adaṇḍakaṃ phalamattakameva, yaṃ sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharituṃ, taṃ
analyzed: pana adaṇḍakam phala mattakam eva yam sakkā sipāṭikāya pakkhipitvā pariharitum tam

original: bhājanīyaṃ. Sikharampi nikhādaneneva saṅgahitaṃ, yehi manussehi vihāre vāsiādīni
analyzed: bhājanīyam sikharam pi nikhādanena iva saṅgahitam yehi manussehi vihāre vāsi ādīni

original: dinnāni honti, te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā vilutte vā “detha no, bhante, upakkhare, puna
analyzed: dinnāni honti te ce ghare daḍḍhe vā vilutte vā detha naḥ bhante upakkhare puna

original: āharissāmā”ti vadanti, dātabbā. Sace haranti, na vāretabbā, anāharantāpi na codetabbā.
analyzed: āharissāma iti vadanti dātabbā sace haranti na vāretabbā an āharantā api na codetabbā

original: Kammārataṭṭakāracundakāranaḷakāramaṇikārapattabandhakānaṃ adhikaraṇimuṭṭhisaṇḍāsatulādīni
analyzed: kammāra taṭṭakāra cundakāra naḷakāra maṇikāra pattabandhakānam adhikaraṇi muṭṭhi saṇḍāsa tulā ādīni

original: sabbāni lohamayāni upakaraṇāni saṅghe dinnakālato paṭṭhāya garubhaṇḍāni. Tipukoṭṭakasuvaṇṇakāracammakāraupakaraṇesupi
analyzed: sabbāni loha mayāni upakaraṇāni saṅghe dinna kālataḥ paṭṭhāya garu bhaṇḍāni tipu koṭṭaka suvaṇṇakāra cammakāra upakaraṇesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso, tipukoṭṭakaupakaraṇesu tipucchedanakasatthakaṃ, suvaṇṇakāraupakaraṇesu
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ ayam pana visesaḥ tipu koṭṭaka upakaraṇesu tipu chedanaka satthakam suvaṇṇakāra upakaraṇesu

original: suvaṇṇacchedanakasatthakaṃ, cammakāraupakaraṇesu kataparikammacammacchedanakhuddakasatthanti
analyzed: suvaṇṇa chedanaka satthakam cammakāra upakaraṇesu kata parikamma camma chedana khuddaka satthanti

original: imāni bhājanīyāni. Nhāpitatunnakāraupakaraṇesupi ṭhapetvā mahākattariṃ mahāsaṇḍāsaṃ
analyzed: imāni bhājanīyāni ṭhapetvā mahā kattarim mahā saṇḍāsam

original: mahāpipphalikañca sabbaṃ vaṭṭati, itarāni garubhaṇḍāni.
analyzed: mahāpipphalikam ca sabbam vaṭṭati itarāni garu bhaṇḍāni

original: Valliādīsu vettavalliādikā yā kāci aḍḍhabāhuppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tatthajātakā
analyzed: valli ādīsu vetta valli ādikā yā kāci aḍḍha bāhu ppamāṇā valli saṅghassa dinnā vā tattha jātakā

original: vā rakkhitagopitāva garubhaṇḍaṃ, sā saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate sace atirekā
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitā ava garu bhaṇḍam sā saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate sace atirekā

original: hoti, puggalikakammepi upanetuṃ vaṭṭati, suttamakacivākanāḷikerahīracammamayā rajjukā
analyzed: hoti puggalika kamme pi upanetum vaṭṭati suttamaka civāka nāḷikera hīra camma mayā rajjukā

original: vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikerahīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā ekavaṭṭā vā dvivaṭṭā vā saṅghassa
analyzed: vā yottāni vā vāke ca nāḷikera hīre ca vaṭṭetvā katā eka vaṭṭā vā dvi vaṭṭā vā saṅghassa

original: santakā garubhaṇḍaṃ. Suttaṃ pana avaṭṭetvā dinnaṃ makacivākanāḷikerahīrā ca bhājanīyā.
analyzed: santakā garu bhaṇḍam suttam pana avaṭṭetvā dinnam maka civāka nāḷikera hīrā ca bhājanīyā

original: Yehi panetāni rajjukādīni dinnāni honti, te attano karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā.
analyzed: yehi pana itāni rajjuka ādīni dinnāni honti te attanaḥ karaṇīyena harantā na vāretabbā

original: Yo koci aṭṭhaṅgulasūcidaṇḍakamattopi veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako vā rakkhitagopito
analyzed: yaḥ koci aṭṭhaṅgula sūci daṇḍaka mattaḥ api veḷu saṅghassa dinnaḥ vā tattha jātakaḥ vā rakkhita gopitaḥ

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ, sopi saṅghassa kamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atireko puggalikakamme dātuṃ
analyzed: garu bhaṇḍam saḥ api saṅghassa kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekaḥ puggalika kamme dātuṃ

original: vaṭṭati. Pādaggaṇhanakatelanāḷi pana kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanadaṇḍako chattadaṇḍo chattasalākāti
analyzed: vaṭṭati pana upāhana daṇḍako chatta daṇḍo chatta salākā ati

original: idamettha bhājanīyabhaṇḍaṃ, daḍḍhagehamanussā gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā.
analyzed: idam ettha bhājanīya bhaṇḍam daḍḍha geha manussāḥ gaṇhitvā gacchantā na vāretabbā

original: Muñjañca pabbajañca avasesañca chadanatiṇaṃ muṭṭhippamāṇampi chadanatiṇasaṅkhepagatesu
analyzed: muñjam ca pabbajam ca avasesam ca chadana tiṇam muṭṭhippamāṇam pi chadana tiṇa saṅkhepa gatesu

original: tālapaṇṇādīsu yaṃkiñci ekapaṇṇampi saṅghassa dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ vā bahiārāme
analyzed: tāla paṇṇa ādīsu yaṃkiñci eka paṇṇam pi saṅghassa dinnam vā tattha jātakam vā bahi ārāme

original: saṅghike tiṇavatthusmiṃ jātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ, tampi saṅghakamme
analyzed: saṅghike tiṇa vatthusmim jātakam vā rakkhita gopitam garu bhaṇḍam tam pi saṅgha kamme

original: ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Daḍḍhagehamanussā gahetvā
analyzed: ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekam puggalika kamme dātum vaṭṭati daḍḍha geha manussāḥ gahetvā

original: gacchantā na vāretabbā, aṭṭhaṅgulappamāṇopi rittakapotthako garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: gacchantā na vāretabbāḥ aṭṭha aṅgula ppamāṇaḥ api ritta kapotthakaḥ garu bhaṇḍam eva

original: Mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañcavaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajjurasakaṅguṭṭhasilesādīsu
analyzed: mattikā pakatimattikā vā hotu pañca vaṇṇā vā sudhā vā sajju rasa kaṅguṭṭha silesa ādīsu

original: vā yaṃkiñci dullabhaṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnaṃ tatthajātakaṃ vā rakkhitagopitaṃ tālapakkamattaṃ
analyzed: vā yaṃkiñci dullabha ṭṭhāne ānetvā vā dinnam tattha jātakam vā rakkhita gopitam tāla pakka mattam

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, tampi saṅghakamme ca cetiyakamme ca kate atirekaṃ puggalikakamme
analyzed: garu bhaṇḍam hoti tam pi saṅgha kamme ca cetiya kamme ca kate atirekam puggalika kamme

original: dātuṃ vaṭṭati. Hiṅguhiṅgulakaharitālamanosilañjanādīni pana bhājanīyāni.
analyzed: dātum vaṭṭati hiṅgu hiṅgulaka haritāla manosilañjana ādīni pana bhājanīyāni

original: Dārubhaṇḍe yo koci veḷumhi vuttappamāṇo dārubhaṇḍako saṅghassa dinno vā tatthajātako
analyzed: dāru bhaṇḍe yaḥ koci veḷumhi vutta ppamāṇaḥ dāru bhaṇḍakaḥ saṅghassa dinnaḥ vā tattha jātako

original: vā rakkhitagopito garubhaṇḍaṃ, api ca sabbāpi dāruveḷucammapāsāṇādivikati dārubhaṇḍena
analyzed: vā rakkhita gopitaḥ garu bhaṇḍam api ca sabbā api dāru veḷu camma pāsāṇa ādi vikati dāru bhaṇḍena

original: saṅgahitā, tattha mañcapīṭhehi asaṅgahitāni āsandikādīni antamaso coḷena vā palālehi
analyzed: saṅgahitā tattha mañca pīṭhehi asaṅgahitāni āsandika ādīni coḷena vā palālehi

original: vā paṇṇehi vā katapīṭhaṃ upādāya sabbāni āsanāni.
analyzed: vā paṇṇehi vā kata pīṭham upādāya sabbāni āsanāni

original: Vaṅkaphalakaṃ dīghaphalakaṃ cīvaradhovanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanaphalakaṃ ghaṭṭanamuggaro
analyzed: vaṅka phalakam dīgha phalakam cīvara dhovana phalakam ghaṭṭana phalakam ghaṭṭana muggaraḥ

original: dantakaṭṭhacchedanagaṇṭhikā daṇḍamuggaro nāvā ambaṇaṃ rajanadoṇi udakapaṭicchako
analyzed: danta kaṭṭha chedana gaṇṭhikā daṇḍamuggaraḥ nāvā ambaṇam rajana doṇi udaka paṭicchakaḥ

original: dārumayo vā dantamayo vā veḷumayo vā sapādakopi apādakopi samuggo mañjūsā pādaggaṇhanakato
analyzed: dāru mayaḥ vā danta mayaḥ vā veḷu mayaḥ vā sa pādakaḥ api a pādakaḥ api sa muggaḥ mañjūsā pāda ggaṇhana kato

original: atirekappamāṇo karaṇḍo udakadoṇi udakakaṭāhaṃ uḷuṅko kaṭacchupānīyasarāvaṃ pānīyasaṅkhoti
analyzed: atireka ppamāṇaḥ karaṇḍaḥ udaka doṇi udaka kaṭāham uḷuṅkaḥ kaṭacchu pānīya sarāvam pānīya saṅkhaḥ iti

original: etesu yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Saṅkhathālakaṃ pana bhājanīyaṃ, tathā dārumayo udakatumbo.
analyzed: etesu yaṃkiñci saṅghe dinnam garubhaṇḍam saṅkhathālakam pana bhājanīyam tathā dāru mayaḥ udaka tumbaḥ

original: Pādakathalikamaṇḍalaṃ dārumayaṃ vā hotu coḷapaṇṇādimayaṃ vā sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍaṃ. Ādhārako
analyzed: pāda kathalika maṇḍalam dāru mayam vā hotu coḷa paṇṇa ādi mayam vā sabbam garu bhaṇḍam ādhārakaḥ

original: pattapidhānaṃ tālavaṇṭaṃ bījanī caṅkoṭakaṃ pacchi yaṭṭhisammuñjanī muṭṭhisammuñjanīti
analyzed: patta pidhānam tālavaṇṭam bījanī caṅkoṭakam pacchi yaṭṭhi sammuñjanī muṭṭhi sammuñjanī iti

original: etesupi yaṃkiñci khuddakaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā dāruveḷupaṇṇacammādīsu yena kenaci kataṃ garubhaṇḍameva.
analyzed: etesu pi yaṃkiñci khuddakam vā mahantam vā dāru veḷu paṇṇa camma ādīsu yena kenacid katam garu bhaṇḍam eva

original: Thambhatulāsopānaphalakādīsu yaṃkiñci dārumayaṃ vā pāsāṇamayaṃ vā gehasambhārūpagaṃ
analyzed: thambha tulā sopāna phalaka ādīsu yaṃkiñci dāru mayam vā pāsāṇa mayam vā geha sambhā rūpagam

original: yo koci kaṭasārako yaṃkiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ yaṃkiñci akappiyacammaṃ, sabbaṃ saṅghikaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ koci kaṭasārakaḥ yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇam yaṃ kiñci a kappiya cammam sabbam saṅghikam

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ, bhūmattharaṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati. Eḷakacammaṃ pana paccattharaṇagatikaṃ

original: hoti, tampi garubhaṇḍameva, kappiyacammāni bhājanīyāni, kurundiyaṃ pana sabbaṃ mañcappamāṇaṃ
analyzed: hoti tam pi garubhaṇḍam eva kappiya cammāni bhājanīyāni kurundiyam pana sabbam mañca ppamāṇam

original: cammaṃ garubhaṇḍanti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: cammam garubhaṇḍam ti vuttam

original: Udukkhalaṃ musalaṃ suppaṃ nisadaṃ nisadapoto pāsāṇadoṇi pāsāṇakaṭāhaṃ sabbaṃ kasibhaṇḍampi
analyzed: udukkhalam musalam suppam nisadam nisada poto pāsāṇa doṇi pāsāṇa kaṭāham sabbam kasibhaṇḍam pi

original: garubhaṇḍaṃ, sabbaṃ cakkayuttayānaṃ garubhaṇḍameva. Mañcapīṭhānaṃ pādā ca aṭaniyo
analyzed: garubhaṇḍam sabbam cakka yutta yānam garubhaṇḍam eva mañca pīṭhānam pādā ca aṭaniyaḥ

original: ca vāsiparasuādīnaṃ daṇḍā cāti etesu yaṃkiñci aniṭṭhitaṃ bhājanīyaṃ, tacchitamaṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: ca vāsi parasu ādīnam daṇḍā ca ati etesu yaṃ kiñci aniṭṭhitam bhājanīyam

original: pana garubhaṇḍaṃ hoti, anuññātavāsiyā daṇḍo chattaṃ muṭṭhipaṇṇaṃ kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā
analyzed: pana garu bhaṇḍam hoti anuññātavāsiyā daṇḍo chattam muṭṭhipaṇṇam kattarayaṭṭhi upāhanā

original: araṇisahitaṃ dhammakaraṇo pādaggaṇhanakato anatirittaṃ āmalakatumbaṃ āmalakaghaṭo
analyzed: araṇi sahitam dhamma karaṇaḥ pādaggaṇhanakataḥ anatirittam āmalaka tumbam āmalaka ghaṭaḥ

original: 5. Mañcapīṭhasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Pañcame mañcanti masārakādīsu aññataraṃ. Pīṭhampi tādisameva, taṃ pana mañco viya atidīghaṃ, āsandiko viya ca samaṃ caturassaṃ na hoti. Chedanakaṃ bhedanakasadisameva.
analyzed: pañcame mañcanti masāraka ādīsu aññataram pīṭham pi tādisam eva tam pana mañcaḥ viya ati dīgham āsandikaḥ viya ca samam catur assam na hoti chedanakam bhedanaka sadisam eva

original: 5-6. Susaṃvutasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: susaṃvuta sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: okkhitta cakkhu sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ujjagghika sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: uccasadda sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: ante tatiya theraḥ iti evam nisinnesu yam saṅgha ttheraḥ dutiya therena saddhim mantā iti

analyzed: kāyappacālaka ādi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pallatthika sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: sama tittika sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: sa padāna sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: navame thūpakato ti matthakato vemajjhato ti attho yaḥ pana parittake sese ekatas saṅkaḍḍhitvā omadditvā bhuñjati tassa api anāpatti

original: 37. Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sūpodana viññatti sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Ekādasame ñātakānaṃ vā pavāritānaṃ vā aññassatthāya attano dhanenāti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
analyzed: ekādasame ñātakānam vā pavāritānam vā aññassa atthāya attanaḥ dhanena ati idam anāpattiyam adhikam

original: 38. Ujjhānasaññīsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ujjhāna saññī sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dvādasame ujjhāne saññā ujjhānasaññā, sā assa atthīti ujjhānasaññī. Idhāpi gilāno na muccati, “dassāmī”ti vā, “dāpessāmī”ti vā olokentassa pana, na ujjhānasaññissa ca anāpatti.
analyzed: dvādasame ujjhāne saññā ujjhāna saññā sā assa atthi iti ujjhāna saññī idha api gilānaḥ na muccati dassāmi iti vā dāpessāmi iti vā olokentassa pana na ujjhāna saññissa ca anāpatti

original: 39. Kabaḷasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: kabaḷa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Terasame nātimahantanti mayūraṇḍaṃ atimahantaṃ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṃ atikhuddakaṃ, tesaṃ vemajjhappamāṇaṃ. Mūlakhādanīyādibhede pana sabbakhajjake phalāphale ca anāpatti.
analyzed: terasame na ati mahantanti mayūra aṇḍam ati mahantam kukkuṭaṇḍam ati khuddakam tesam vemajjha ppamāṇam mūla khādanīya ādi bhede pana sabba khajjake phala aphale ca anāpatti

original: 40. Ālopasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ālopa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Cuddasame parimaṇḍalanti adīghaṃ. Idha pana khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
analyzed: adīgham idha pana khajjaka phala aphalehi saddhim uttari bhaṅge pi anāpatti

original: 41-42. Anāhaṭasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: anāhaṭa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Pannarasame anāhaṭeti anāharite, mukhadvāraṃ asampatteti attho. Soḷasame sabbahatthanti sakalaṃ hatthaṃ.
analyzed: pannarasame anāhaṭa iti an āharite mukha dvāram asampatta iti attho soḷasame sabba hattham ti sakalam hattham

original: 43. Sakabaḷasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sa kabaḷa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Sattarasame sakabaḷenāti ettha yattakena vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ hoti, tattake sati kathentassa
analyzed: sattarasame sa kabaḷena ati ettha yattakena vacanam a paripuṇṇam hoti tattake sati kathentassa

original: āpatti. Yo pana dhammaṃ kathento hariṭakādīni mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti, yattakena
analyzed: āpatti yaḥ pana dhammam kathentaḥ hariṭaka ādīni mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti yattakena

original: vacanaṃ aparipuṇṇaṃ na hoti, tattake mukhamhi sati vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vacanam a paripuṇṇam na hoti tattake mukhamhi sati vaṭṭati

original: 44. Piṇḍukkhepakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: piṇḍukkhepaka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Aṭṭhārasame piṇḍukkhepakanti piṇḍaṃ ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā, idhāpi khajjakaphalāphalesu anāpatti.
analyzed: aṭṭhārasame piṇḍukkhepakam ti piṇḍam ukkhipitvā ukkhipitvā idha api khajjaka phala aphalesu anāpatti

original: 45. Kabaḷāvacchedakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Ekūnavīsatime kabaḷāvacchedakanti kabaḷaṃ avacchinditvā avacchinditvā, idha khajjakaphalāphalehi saddhiṃ uttaribhaṅgepi anāpatti.
analyzed: ekūnavīsatime kabaḷa avacchedakam ti kabaḷam avacchinditvā avacchinditvā saddhim uttari bhaṅge pi anāpatti

original: 46. Avagaṇḍakārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: avagaṇḍakāraka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Vīsatime avagaṇḍakārakanti makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe katvā katvā, idha phalāphalamattake anāpatti.
analyzed: vīsatime makkaṭaḥ gaṇḍe katvā katvā idha anāpatti

original: 47. Hatthaniddhunakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: hatthaniddhunaka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Ekavīsatime hatthaniddhunakanti hatthaṃ niddhunitvā niddhunitvā, anāpattiyaṃ panettha “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento hatthaṃ niddhunātī”ti idaṃ adhikaṃ.
analyzed: ekavīsatime hattha niddhunakam ti hattham niddhunitvā niddhunitvā anāpattiyam pana ittha kaca varam chaḍḍentaḥ hattham niddhunāti iti idam adhikam

original: 48. Sitthāvakārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sitthāvakāraka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dvāvīsatime sitthāvakārakanti sitthāni avakiritvā avakiritvā, idhāpi “kacavaraṃ chaḍḍento sitthaṃ chaḍḍayatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
analyzed: dvāvīsatime sitthāvakārakanti sitthāni avakiritvā avakiritvā idha api kaca varam chaḍḍento sittham chaḍḍayati iti idam anāpattiyam adhikam

original: 49. Jivhānicchārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Tevīsatime jivhānicchārakanti jivhaṃ nicchāretvā nicchāretvā.
analyzed: tevīsatime jivhā nicchārakanti jivham nicchāretvā nicchāretvā

original: 50-51. Capucapukārakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: capu capu kāraka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Catuvīsatime capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṃ saddaṃ katvā katvā. Pañcavīsatimepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: catuvīsatime capu capu kārakanti capu capu iti evam saddam katvā katvā pañcavīsatime pi esā iva nayo

original: 52…Pe…54. hatthanillehakādisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: hattha nillehaka ādi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Chabbīsatime hatthanillehakanti hatthaṃ nillehitvā nillehitvā. Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi
analyzed: chabbīsatime hattha nillehakam ti hattham nillehitvā nillehitvā bhuñjantena hi

original: nillehituṃ na vaṭṭati. Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo
analyzed: nillehitum na vaṭṭati ghana yāgu phāṇita pāyāsa ādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyaḥ

original: mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, sattavīsatimaaṭṭhavīsatimesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
analyzed: mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjitum vaṭṭati sattavīsatima aṭṭhavīsatimesu pi esa iva tasmā

original: ekaṅguliyāpi patto na nillehitabbo, ekaoṭṭhopi ca jivhāya na nillehitabbo, oṭṭhamaṃsehi
analyzed: eka aṅguliyā api pattaḥ na nillehitabbaḥ eka oṭṭhaḥ api ca jivhāya na nillehitabbaḥ oṭṭha maṃsehi

original: eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetum vaṭṭati

original: 55. Sāmisasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sāmisa sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Ekūnatiṃsatime na sāmisenāti etaṃ paṭikūlavasena paṭikkhittaṃ, tasmā saṅghikampi
analyzed: ekūnatiṃsatime na sa āmisena ati etam paṭikūla vasena paṭikkhittam tasmā saṅghikam pi

original: puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhopi sarāvakampi thālakampi na
analyzed: puggalikam pi gihi santakam pi attano santakam pi saṅkhopi sarāvakam pi thālakam pi na

original: gahetabbameva, gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṃ. Sace pana hatthassa ekadeso āmisamakkhito na
analyzed: gahetabbam eva gaṇhantassa dukkaṭam sace pana hatthassa eka desaḥ āmisa makkhitaḥ na

original: hoti, tena padesena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati, idha “dhovissāmīti vā, dhovāpessāmīti vā paṭiggaṇhātī”ti
analyzed: hoti tena padesena gahetum vaṭṭati idha dhovissāmi iti vā dhovāpessāmi iti vā paṭiggaṇhāti iti

original: idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
analyzed: idam adhikam

original: 56. Sasitthakasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sa sitthaka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Tiṃsatime “uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍetī”ti idaṃ
analyzed: tiṃsatime uddharitvā vā bhinditvā vā paṭiggahe vā nīharitvā vā chaḍḍeti iti idam

original: anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ. Tattha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā, ekasmiṃ
analyzed: anāpattiyam adhikam tattha uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakataḥ uddharitvā ekasmin

original: ṭhāne rāsiṃ katvā udakaṃ chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni
analyzed: ṭhāne rāsim katvā udakam chaḍḍeti bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni

original: katvā chaḍḍeti. Paṭiggahe vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchantānaṃ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti. Nīharitvāti
analyzed: katvā chaḍḍeti paṭiggahe vā ati paṭiggahena paṭicchantānam paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti nīharitvā iti

original: bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti, evaṃ chaḍḍentassa anāpatti.
analyzed: bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti evam chaḍḍentassa anāpatti

original: Tiṃsabhojanappaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: tiṃsabhojana paṭisaṃyutta sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 57. Chattapāṇisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: chatta pāṇi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttesu paṭhame yaṃkiñci chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. So
analyzed: dhamma desanā paṭisaṃyuttesu paṭhame yaṃkiñci chattam pāṇimhi assa ati chatta pāṇi so

original: taṃ chattaṃ yatthakatthaci sarīrāvayave ṭhapetvāpi yāva hatthena na muñcati, tāvassa
analyzed: tam chattam yattha katthaci sarīra avayave ṭhapetvā api hatthena na muñcati

original: dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa añño chattaṃ dhāreti, passe vā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
analyzed: dhammam desetum na vaṭṭati sace panassa añño chattam dhāreti passe vā ṭhitam hoti

original: hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na hoti, tassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Dhammaparicchedo
analyzed: hatthataḥ apagata matte chatta pāṇi nāma na hoti tassa desetum vaṭṭati dhamma paricchedaḥ

original: cettha padasodhamme vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
analyzed: ca ittha pada sodhamme vutta nayena iva veditabbo

original: 58-59. Daṇḍapāṇisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: daṇḍa pāṇi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dutiye daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo, daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa
analyzed: dutiye daṇḍaḥ nāma majjhimassa purisassa catu hattha ppamāṇaḥ daṇḍa pāṇi bhāvo panassa

original: chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Tatiyepi eseva nayo. Asiṃ sannahitvā ṭhitopi
analyzed: chatta pāṇimhi vutta nayena iva veditabbaḥ tatiye pi esā iva nayaḥ asim sannahitvā ṭhitaḥ api

original: hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṃ na gacchati.
analyzed: hi sattha pāṇi saṅkhyam na gacchati

original: 60. Āvudhapāṇisikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: āvudhapāṇi sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Catutthe sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṃ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbā, tasmā saddhiṃ
analyzed: catutthe sabbā api dhanuvikati saddhim saravikatiyā veditabbā tasmā saddhim

analyzed: vā sarena dhanum gahetvā suddha dhanum vā suddha saram vā sa jiya dhanum vā nijjiya dhanum

original: vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammaṃ desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa dhanu
analyzed: vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammam desetum na vaṭṭati sace panassa dhanu

original: khandhepi paṭimukkaṃ hoti, yāva na gaṇhāti, tāva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: khandhe pi paṭimukkam hoti yāva na gaṇhāti tāva vaṭṭati

original: 61-62. Pādukasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pāduka sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

analyzed: pañcame pādukā āruḷhassa ati chatta daṇḍake aṅgu antarikam a pavesetvā kevalam akkantassa

original: vā, pavesetvā ṭhānavasena paṭimukkassa vā. Chaṭṭhepi eseva nayo. Idha pana yvāyaṃ
analyzed: vā pavesetvā ṭhāna vasena paṭimukkassa vā chaṭṭhe pi esā iva nayaḥ idha pana yvā ayam

analyzed: paṇhika bandham omuñcitvā ṭhāna vasena omukkaḥ ti vuccati tassa api na vaṭṭati

original: 63. Yānasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: yāna sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Sattame sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito, sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā vaṃsena vayhati,
analyzed: sattame sace pi dvīhi janehi hattha saṅghāṭena gahito sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā vaṃsena

original: ayutte vā vayhādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi nisinno hoti, yānagatotveva
analyzed: a yutte vā vayha ādike yāne visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakka matte pi nisinnaḥ hoti

original: saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati. Visuṃ nisinnesupi
analyzed: saṅkham gacchati sace pana dve api eka yāne nisinnāḥ honti vaṭṭati visum nisinnesu pi

original: ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṃ vaṭṭati, samappamāṇepi vaṭṭati, tathā
analyzed: ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetum vaṭṭati samappamāṇe pi vaṭṭati tathā

original: purime nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa. Pacchime pana uccatarepi nisinnena desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: purime nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa pacchime pana uccatare pi nisinnena desetum na vaṭṭati

original: 64. Sayanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: sayana sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Aṭṭhame sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi
analyzed: aṭṭhame sayana gatassa ati antamasaḥ kaṭasārake pi pakati bhūmiyam pi nipannassa ucce pi

original: mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmippadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṃ na vaṭṭati. Sayanagatena
analyzed: mañce vā pīṭhe vā bhūmi ppadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetum na vaṭṭati sayana gatena

original: pana sayanagatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṃ vaṭṭati. Nipannena
analyzed: pana sayana gatassa uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetum vaṭṭati nipannena

original: pana ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā, nisinnena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
analyzed: pana ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā nipannassa vā nisinnena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa

original: vā, ṭhitena ṭhitasseva vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vā ṭhitena ṭhitassa iva vaṭṭati

original: 65. Pallatthikasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pallatthika sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Navame hatthapallatthikādīsu yāya kāyaci nisinnassa desetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
analyzed: navame hattha pallatthika ādīsu yāya kāyaci nisinnassa desetum na vaṭṭati

original: 66. Veṭhitasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: veṭhita sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dasame veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati, evaṃ veṭhitasīsassa, tenevassa anāpattiyaṃ “kesantaṃ vivarāpetvā desetī”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dasame veṭhita sīsassa ati dussa veṭhena vā moḷi ādīhi vā yathā kesantaḥ na dissati evam veṭhita sīsassa anāpattiyam kesantam vivarāpetvā deseti iti vuttam

original: 67. Oguṇṭhitasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: oguṇṭhita sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Ekādasame oguṇṭhitasīsassāti sasīsaṃ pārutassa, anāpattiyaṃ panettha “sīsaṃ vivarāpetvā desetī”ti adhikaṃ.
analyzed: ekādasame oguṇṭhita sīsassa ati sa sīsam pārutassa anāpattiyam pana ittha sīsam vivarāpetvā deseti iti adhikam

original: 68. Chamāsikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: chamā sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Dvādasame chamāyaṃ nisīditvāti bhūmiyaṃ nisīditvā. Āsaneti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
analyzed: dvādasame chamāyam nisīditvā ati bhūmiyam nisīditvā āsanā iti antamasaḥ vattham pi tiṇāni pi santharitvā nisinnassa

original: 69. Nīcāsanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nīcāsana sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Terasame ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnatappadese nisinnassa.
analyzed: terasame ucce āsane iti antamasaḥ bhūmi ppadese pi unnata ppadese nisinnassa

original: 70. Ṭhitasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ṭhita sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Cuddasame na ṭhito nisinnassāti sace therassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā ṭhitaṃ daharaṃ āsane
analyzed: cuddasame na ṭhitaḥ nisinnassa ati sace therassa upaṭṭhānam gantvā ṭhitam daharam āsane

analyzed: nisinnaḥ mahā theraḥ pañham pucchati na kathetabbam gāravena pana theram uṭṭhahitvā

original: pucchā”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, tasmā “passe ṭhitassa bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: puccha ati vattum na sakkā tasmā passe ṭhitassa bhikkhuno kathessāmi iti kathetum vaṭṭati

original: 71. Pacchatogamanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: pacchatogamana sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Pannarasame sace purato gacchanto pañhaṃ pucchati, tassa taṃ akathetvā “pacchimassa
analyzed: pannarasame sace puratas gacchanto pañham pucchati tassa tam a kathetvā pacchimassa

original: bhikkhuno kathessāmī”ti kathetabbaṃ. Saddhiṃ uggahitadhammaṃ pana sajjhāyituṃ, samadhurena
analyzed: bhikkhuno kathessāmi iti kathetabbam saddhim uggahita dhammam pana sajjhāyitum sa madhurena

original: vā gacchantassa kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: vā gacchantassa kathetum vaṭṭati

original: 72. Uppathenagamanasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: uppathenagamana sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Soḷasame na uppathenāti ettha sace dvepi sakaṭamaggasmiṃ ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṃ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
analyzed: na uppathena ati ettha sace dve pi sakaṭa maggasmiṃ ekeka cakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuram gacchanti vaṭṭati

original: 73. Ṭhitouccārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ṭhitouccāra sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā

original: Sattarasame “asañciccā”ti anāpattiyaṃ sace paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma hoti.
analyzed: sattarasame a sañcicca ati anāpattiyam sace paṭicchanna ṭhānam gacchantassa sahasā uccāraḥ vā passāvaḥ vā nikkhamati a sañcicca kataḥ nāma hoti

original: 74. Hariteuccārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Aṭṭhārasame yampi jīvamānarukkhassa mūlaṃ pathaviyaṃ dissamānaṃ gacchati, sākhā vā
analyzed: aṭṭhārasame yam pi jīvamāna rukkhassa mūlam pathaviyam dissamānam gacchati sākhā vā

original: bhūmilaggā gacchati, sabbaṃ haritasaṅkhātameva. Khandhe nisīditvā pana appaharitaṭṭhāne
analyzed: bhūmi laggā gacchati sabbam harita saṅkhātam eva khandhe nisīditvā pana appaharita ṭṭhāne

original: pātetuṃ vaṭṭati. Sace appaharitaṭṭhānaṃ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne
analyzed: pātetum vaṭṭati sace appaharita ṭṭhānam olokentassa iva sahasā nikkhamati gilāna ṭṭhāne

original: ṭhito hoti, “appaharite kato haritaṃ ottharatī”ti idamettha anāpattiyaṃ adhikaṃ.
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ hoti appaharite kataḥ haritam ottharati iti idam ettha anāpattiyam adhikam

original: Tattha sacepi appaharitaṃ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṃ vā palalaṇḍupakaṃ vā ṭhapetvā
analyzed: tattha sace pi appaharitam a labhantena tiṇaṇḍupakam vā pala laṇḍupakam vā ṭhapetvā

original: kato pacchā haritaṃ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi saṅgahitā.
analyzed: pacchā haritam ottharati kheḷena ca ittha siṅghāṇikā api saṅgahitā

original: 75. Udakeuccārasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā
Ekūnavīsatime na udaketi etaṃ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ, vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu
analyzed: ekūnavīsatime na udaka iti etam paribhoga odakam eva sandhāya vuttam vacca kuṭi samudda ādi udakesu

original: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakoghe jāte anudakaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: pana a paribhogesu anāpatti deve vassante samantataḥ udaka oghe jāte an udakaṭṭhānaṃ

original: alabhantena udake kātuṃ vaṭṭati, idhāpi “thale kato udakaṃ ottharatī”ti idaṃ anāpattiyaṃ
analyzed: a labhantena udake kātum vaṭṭati idha api thale kato udakam ottharati iti idam anāpattiyam

original: adhikaṃ, sesaṃ sabbasikkhāpadesu uttānameva.
analyzed: adhikam sesam sabba sikkhāpadesu uttānam eva

analyzed: samuṭṭhāna ādi dīpana atthāya pana ittha idam pakiṇṇakam

analyzed: cattāri sa kabaḷena mukhena byāharaṇam ekam chama anīca āsana nisinna ṭhita pacchatas gamana oppatha gamana paṭisaṃyuttāni

original: pañcāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni, ekekamettha kiriyaṃ, saññāvimokkhaṃ,
analyzed: pañca ati imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsana samuṭṭhānāni ekekam ettha kiriyam saññā vimokkham

original: sacittakaṃ, lokavajjaṃ, kāyakammaṃ, vacīkammaṃ, akusalacittaṃ, dukkhavedanaṃ. Sūpodanaviññattisikkhāpadaṃ
analyzed: sa cittakam lokavajjam kāya kammam vacī kammam akusala cittam dukkha vedanam su upodana viññatti sikkhāpadam

analyzed: vacī kammam akusala cittam dukkha vedanam chatta pāṇi daṇḍa pāṇi sattha pāṇi āvudha pāṇi pādukā upāhana yāna sayana pallatthika veṭhita oguṇṭhita nāmakāni

original: ekādasa dhammadesanāsamuṭṭhānāni, kiriyākiriyāni, saññāvimokkhāni, sacittakāni, lokavajjāni,

original: vacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanāni. Sesāni tepaṇṇāsa paṭhamapārājikasamauṭṭhānādibhedānīti.

original: Ekūnavīsatidhammadesanāpaṭisaṃyuttasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: ekūnavīsati dhamma desanā paṭisaṃyutta sikkhāpada vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā pātimokkhavaṇṇanāya
analyzed: kaṅkhā vitaraṇiyā pātimokkha vaṇṇanāya

original: Sekhiyavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sekhiya vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Adhikaraṇasamathavaṇṇanā
Adhikaraṇasamathesu sattāti tesaṃ gaṇanaparicchedo. Adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamentīti
analyzed: adhikaraṇa samathesu tesam gaṇana paricchedaḥ adhikaraṇāni samenti vūpasamenti iti

analyzed: sammukha avinayaḥ dātabbā upe ti ime satta samathā dātabbā tatra ayam vinicchayo

original: – adhikaraṇesu tāva “dhammo”ti vā, “adhammo”ti vā aṭṭhārasahi vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ

original: bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā
analyzed: bhikkhūnam yaḥ vivādaḥ idam vivāda adhikaraṇam nāma sīla vipattiyā vā ācāra diṭṭhi ājīva vipattiyā

analyzed: sace pana evam pi na sammati atha nam ubbāhikāya sammatāḥ bhikkhū na mayam sakkoma

analyzed: yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājika sāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññena aññam paṭicarataḥ

original: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā pātimokkhavaṇṇanāya

original: Bhikkhunipātimokkhavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: bhikkhuni pātimokkha vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamanakathā
analyzed: nigamana kathā

original: Ettāvatā ca –
analyzed: ettāvatā ca

original: Vaṇṇanaṃ pātimokkhassa, soṇattherena yācito;
analyzed: vaṇṇanam pātimokkhassa soṇa ttherena yācito

original: Vinaye jātakaṅkhānaṃ, kaṅkhāvitaraṇatthiko.
analyzed: vinaye jāta kaṅkhānam kaṅkhā vitaraṇa atthiko

original: Ārabhiṃ yamahaṃ sabbaṃ, sīhaḷaṭṭhakathānayaṃ;
analyzed: ārabhim yam aham sabbam

original: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, vācanāmagganissitaṃ.
analyzed: mahāvihāra vāsīnam vācanā magga nissitam

original: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
analyzed: nissāya sā ayam niṭṭham gatā ādāya sabbaso

original: Sabbaṃ aṭṭhakathāsāraṃ, pāḷiyatthañca kevalaṃ.
analyzed: sabbam aṭṭhakathā sāram pāḷiya ttham ca kevalam

original: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
analyzed: na ha ittha tam padam atthi yam virujjheyya pāḷiyā

original: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā.
analyzed: mahāvihāra vāsīnam porāṇa aṭṭhakathāhi vā

original: Yasmā tasmā akatvāva, ettha kaṅkhaṃ hitesinā;
analyzed: yasmai tasmai a katvā avaḥ ettha kaṅkham hitesinā

original: Sikkhitabbāva sakkaccaṃ, kaṅkhāvitaraṇī ayaṃ.
analyzed: sikkhitabbā ava sakkaccam kaṅkhā vitaraṇī ayam

original: Yathā ca niṭṭhaṃ sampattā, kaṅkhāvitaraṇī ayaṃ;
analyzed: yathā ca niṭṭham sampattā kaṅkhā vitaraṇī ayam

original: Dvāvīsati bhāṇavārapaamāṇāya pāḷiyā.
analyzed: dvāvīsati bhāṇa vāra paamāṇāya pāḷiyā

original: Evaṃ anantarāyena, niṭṭhaṃ kalyāṇanissitā;
analyzed: evam anantarāyena niṭṭham kalyāṇa nissitā

original: Aciraṃ sabbasattānaṃ, yantu sabbe manorathāti.
analyzed: aciram sabba sattānam yantu sabbe manorathā ati

original: Paramavisuddhasaddhābuddhivīriyappaṭimaṇḍitena sīlācārajjavamaddavādiguṇasamudayasamuditena
analyzed: parama visuddha saddhā buddhi vīriya ppaṭimaṇḍitena sīla ācāra java maddava ādi guṇa samudaya samuditena

original: sakasamayasamayantaragahanajjhogāhaṇasamatthena paññāveyyattiyasamannāgatena tipiṭakapariyattippabhede
analyzed: saka samaya samaya antara gahana ajjhogāhaṇa samatthena paññā veyyattiya samannāgatena ti piṭaka pariyat tippa bhede

original: sāṭṭhakathe satthusāsane appaṭihatañāṇappabhāvena mahāveyyākaraṇena karaṇasampattijanitasuviniggatamadhaurodāravacanalāvaṇṇayuttena
analyzed: sa aṭṭhakathe satthu sāsane appaṭihata ñāṇa ppabhāvena mahā veyyākaraṇena karaṇa sampatti janita su viniggata madhaura udāra vacana lāvaṇṇa yuttena

original: yuttamuttavādinā vādīvarena mahākavinā pabhinnapaṭisambhidāparivāre chaḷabhiññādippabhedaguṇappaṭimaṇḍite
analyzed: yutta mutta vādinā vādīvarena mahā kavinā pabhinna paṭisambhidā parivāre chaṣ abhiññā ādi ppabheda guṇa ppaṭimaṇḍite

original: uttarimanussadhamme suppatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ theravaṃsappadīpānaṃ therānaṃ mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ
analyzed: uttari manussa dhamme su patiṭṭhita buddhīnam thera vaṃsa ppadīpānam therānam mahāvihāra vāsīnam

original: vaṃsālaṅkārabhūtena vipulavisuddhabuddhinā buddhaghosoti garūhi gahitanāmadheyyena
analyzed: vaṃsa alaṅkāra bhūtena vipula visuddha buddhinā buddha ghosaḥ iti garūhi gahita nāmadheyyena

original: therena katā ayaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇī nāma pātimokkhavaṇṇanā –
analyzed: therena katā ayam kaṅkhāvitaraṇī nāma pātimokkha vaṇṇanā

original: Tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmiṃ, lokanittharaṇesinaṃ;
analyzed: tāva tiṭṭhatu lokasmim loka nittharaṇa īsinam

original: Dassentī kulaputtānaṃ, nayaṃ sīlavisuddhiyā.
analyzed: dassentī kula puttānam nayam sīla visuddhiyā

original: Yāva “buddho”ti nāmampi, suddhacittassa tādino;
analyzed: yāva buddhaḥ ti nāmam pi suddhacittassa tādinaḥ

original: Lokamhi lokajeṭṭhassa, pavattati mahesinoti.
analyzed: lokamhi loka jeṭṭhassa pavattati mahesino ti

original: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇī-aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kaṅkhāvitaraṇī aṭṭhakathā niṭṭhitā
